Subdivision.SubDescription: Garretson at Del Sur is conveniently located in the coastal hills of North County approximately 7 miles from the Pacific Ocean and close to sought-after shopping, dining and acclaimed Poway Unified schools.. Expansive amenities include neighborhood parks, solar-heated swimming pools, scenic trails and preserved open space in the Del Sur Master Planned Community. Del Sur is inspired by San Diego’s rich Spanish history and presents authentic architecture, a commitment to conservation and a dynamic community life. Garretson at Del Sur is a thoughtfully designed, two-story townhomes, three open floor plans with 1,518 to 1,867 square feet with three to four bedrooms, two-and-a-half to three baths. These homes include front courtyards ideal for outdoor barbecues and spacious Great Rooms flow into gourmet kitchens and dining areas. Spanish Romantica, Rancho Adobe and Monterey exterior architectural styles distinguish the homes.

Subdivision.SubDescription: The Estates at Del Sur is conveniently located in the coastal hills of North County approximately 7 miles from the Pacific Ocean and close to sought-after shopping, dining and acclaimed Poway Unified schools.. Expansive amenities include neighborhood parks, solar-heated swimming pools, scenic trails and preserved open space in the Del Sur Master Planned Community. Del Sur is inspired by San Diego’s rich Spanish history and presents authentic architecture, a commitment to conservation and a dynamic community life. A collection of 56 Estate-caliber homes on quarter- to one-acre lots with views set behind private gates. The Estates are beautifully integrated single-level and two-story floor plans with 4,396 to 7,384 square feet of living space, up to six bedrooms and six-and-one-half baths. Residents will enjoy soaring ceilings, chef-par kitchens, expansive indoor-outdoor entertaining spaces, libraries or bonus rooms, sleeping porches and four-car garages. In addition The Estates offers ample amount of customizations with optional guest suites, master retreats, wine rooms, club rooms, pet suites and private casitas (select plans)

The chef’s kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, Juperana Persa granite countertops with custom Tuileries backsplash in Chloe Brique, and Emilia cabinets in Chocolate Glaze. A library accommodates the collector or entrepreneur. Enticing extras include a caterer’s kitchen, super laundry, custom countertops with backsplash and shower surrounds at all baths, lighting package, pre-wiring, security system, decorative hand-textured drywall finish and Italian-inspired architectural details. A large yard features breathtaking hillside views, includes beautiful upgraded flooring throughout.

Subdivision.SubDescription: With a convenient North County location along a scenic ridge, Avery Pointe at Veridian showcases brand new townhomes in close proximity to Del Sur and Del Norte High School.. Five distinctive floorplans feature two- and three-story home designs with open interiors including large Great Rooms and gourmet kitchens. Third-floor bonus room options and side or backyards accommodate active families. The gated townhome community overlooks a picturesque ridge and is surrounded by open space. Neighborhood amenities include a recreation center with swimming pool, spa, outdoor barbeques and lounge area plus an intimate community park. The convenient North County San Diego location is close to Del Sur, shopping, dining, parks, entertainment and major freeways including the I-15 and SR-56, and residents are included in the acclaimed Poway Unified School District with Del Norte High School just minutes away. This collection of 100 brand new, attached townhomes features Spanish Romantica, Rancho and Monterey architectural influences. The two- and three-story floorplans range from 1,765 to 2,554 square feet, 3 to 4 bedrooms plus loft, 2.5 to 3.5 baths and have 2-car garages and side or backyards. Great Rooms lead easily to chef’s kitchens and dedicated dining areas perfect for entertaining. Select plans feature a downstairs bedroom with bath and third-floor bonus room with tech space.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Auberge will be a new age-exclusive gated community that offers resort-style amenities including an expansive recreation center with swimming pool, spa, fitness center, library, multi-function rooms set up for entertainment, meetings or social groups, pickle ball court, bocce ball court, BBQ’s and an intimate outdoor setting to relax with family and friends.. Nestled within the master planned community of Del Sur, Auberge is located in the scenic valley of Del Sur, surrounded by open space, and near extensive shopping and dining opportunities.
Auberge’s three unique neighborhoods will offer single story living, with select plans featuring second story bedrooms, lofts, bonus rooms and optional dual master suites. Thoughtfully designed floorplans feature 1,276 to 2,907 square feet of living space, two to five bedrooms plus office and bonus, and two to four baths. Each home includes a first-floor bedroom with bath for easy access living.
Models are anticipated to be completed March 2016 with first move ins estimated for Mid Summer 2016.
Join the interest list to receive the latest news and information about Auberge at Del Sur.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Andalucia at Harmony Grove Village is an all new master planned community that blends a rural landscape with modern design sensibility.. Harmony Grove Village natural elements encompass relocated Heritage oaks, multi-use trails, picturesque parks and an equestrian area and dog park. Resort-style amenities include The Grove Recreation Area with swimming pool, spa, wading pool and splash pad plus BBQ areas, shade structures and playground. In addition the 4th of July Park is a village hallmark offering dedicated space for outdoor concerts, ball games and celebratory events. Homeowners will enjoy a convenient location just west of the I-15, close to the SR-78 and minutes from sought-after shopping and dining, Lake Hodges, Elfin Forest, Safari Park and more. Collection of 130 spacious new single-family homes, Andalucia showcases three distinctive floor plans with 3,027 to 3,701 square feet, four to five bedrooms, four-and-a-half baths and three-car garages. Residents will find Great Rooms integrate easily with gourmet kitchens, dining areas and optional California Rooms ideal for outdoor living. All plans include first-floor bedroom with bath, dedicated office and versatile bonus room. Homeowners will find flexible interiors with optional bedroom, dining room or recreation room with tech space or refreshment center (select plans). Exterior architecture is reflective of Farmhouse, Craftsman, Cottage and Monterey influences.

Above the three car garage, facilitate plenty of family entertaining with the optional recreation room and refreshment center (adding 519 square feet too this four bedroom home).. Find a Craftsman-style staircase, which leads to a large bonus room providing multi-purpose space for study, exercise or entertainment. Two secondary bedrooms, also upstairs, share a uniquely designed Jack-and-Jill bath with extra storage and independent sinks. A fourth bedroom with en-suite bath accommodates additional family members or guests. The conveniently located laundry room with extra storage maximizes home organization. Located in its own wing of the home, the master suite offers supreme privacy and features oversized doors, an expansive walk-in closet and relaxing bath with dual sinks, large shower and spa-like soaking tub.

Seabreeze at Harmony Grove Village is an all new master planned community that blends a rural landscape with modern design sensibility. Harmony Grove Village natural elements encompass relocated Heritage oaks, multi-use trails, picturesque parks and an equestrian area and dog park. Resort-style amenities include The Grove Recreation Area with swimming pool, spa, wading pool and splash pad plus BBQ areas, shade structures and playground. In addition the 4th of July Park is a village hallmark offering dedicated space for outdoor concerts, ball games and celebratory events. Homeowners will enjoy a convenient location just west of the I-15, close to the SR-78 and minutes from sought-after shopping and dining, Lake Hodges, Elfin Forest, Safari Park and more. Seabreeze at Harmony Grove Village offers a collection of 109 innovative new single-family homes. These homes showcase Farmhouse, Craftsman, Cottage and Monterey architectural influences.

Listing.Description: This graciously appointed two-story home includes a charming front porch and traditional architectural styling adding visual interest.. A tucked-away fourth bedroom with private bath, adjacent to the home’s entry, is easily transformed into a home office or guest room. Find a two-car garage and large storage closet under the stairs providing out-of-sight storage possibilities. On the second story, a bonus room at the top of the stairs creates a dedicated space for family entertainment. Adjacent to the bonus room, a laundry room—with upper and lower cabinet options— maximizes efficiency. Active families will enjoy two secondary bedrooms with en-suite bath also upstairs. The rejuvenating master suite provides a private sanctuary with large walk-in closet and relaxing bath with dual sinks, shower and optional soaking tub.

The kitchen showcases a large center island workstation, modern appliances, European-style cabinets with under cabinet lighting and an ample walk-in pantry. A downstairs bedroom with full bath is adjacent to the front entrance and provides privacy for guests or children. At the rear of the home, find a two-car garage and a conveniently located powder room. Upstairs, a versatile bonus room offers a dedicated area for family entertainment. Plentiful square footage upstairs includes two secondary bedrooms, bedroom 2 with ensuite bath and bedroom 3 with walk-in closet. The laundry room, close to the second-story bedrooms, affords a variety of storage options for optimal organization. The generous master suite occupies its own wing of the home and is equipped with a large walk-in closet and built-in linen closet. The spa-inspired master bath encompasses a relaxation shower, dual sinks, and soaking tub.

A charming front porch extends across the width of the home’s exterior and adds eye appeal.. The deluxe master suite showcases a highboy or linen cabinet option for storage plus private bath outfitted with dual sinks, large shower, spa-like tub and ample walk-in closet. Great Room, with niche for media opportunities, leads to kitchen and spacious dining area where slider doors offer indoor-outdoor connectivity. Kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, culinary preparation island, walk-in pantry and a choice of cabinets in white or maple with stain. Master bedroom is enhanced by private bath with separate shower and soaking tub, walk-in closet and niche for furniture piece or optional built-in dresser. Laundry room with cabinetry is conveniently positioned upstairs near bedrooms.

A third-floor bonus room distinguishes this floor plan, ideal as a teen lounge, private office or hobby area.. A formal entry opens up to a spacious Great Room and adjacent kitchen and dining area. Cook's kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, choice of cabinets in white or maple with stain and peninsula with bar seating. Slider doors on the first floor offer indoor-outdoor connectivity. Master bedroom is located upstairs and features a walk-in closet and private bath with separate shower and soaking tub. Also included is a powder bath for guests, upstairs laundry room with cabinets, and a Jack-and-Jill bathroom for secondary bedrooms.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Wellesley’s unique collection of triplex townhomes expertly pairs spaciousness with functionality.. Smart and stylish interiors combine with generous outdoor living spaces to provide a beautiful backdrop to your busy life. A College Park address puts you in easy reach of the area’s many employment centers, shopping destinations, picturesque parks and mountain resorts, plus a resort-inspired community recreation center. Wellesley is conveniently located within the master-planned community of College Park in Chino. Residents will enjoy a family-friendly neighborhood, college town atmosphere and extensive onsite amenities including a private, resort-style recreation center with fitness facility, swimming pools and splash park, barbecue and picnic areas, and fireplace lounge. Nearby, homeowners may enjoy 140-acre Ayala Park as well as Prado Regional Park featuring fishing, golf, horseback riding and camping. Wellesley is close to the local elementary school, state-of-the-art Chaffey College, shopping, dining and freeways. Triplex townhomes at Wellesley feature 1,815 to 2,087 square feet, four bedrooms (including one downstairs), three baths, two-car detached garages and spacious yards. Bright kitchens flow into large Great Rooms perfect for entertaining. Modern floor plans offer coveted launch areas adjacent to the kitchen plus laundry room storage to maximize organization. Energy-efficient features include tankless water heaters and Low-E dual glazed windows. Included front yard landscaping enhances the new homes, which showcase Craftsman, Prairie and Spanish architectural influences.

Listing.Description: Front yard landscaping maintained by the HOA and plentiful windows offer visual appeal.. This townhome design features generous gathering spaces including a Great Room with media niche, dining area and cook’s kitchen. Kitchen is beautifully outfitted with food preparation island, granite countertops, walk-in pantry and choice of cabinets in white or stain grade. A first-floor bedroom with full bath provides versatility. A rejuvenating master suite upstairs incorporates a walk-in closet and private bath with separate shower and soaking tub. A laundry room with cabinets and ContainIt! Closet, also upstairs, minimize clutter. Defining the home is a large backyard with covered rear porch conducive to entertaining. A two-car detached garage leads to a dedicated launch area for heightened organization.

Make a grand entrance thanks to HOA-maintained front yard landscaping and a stylish streetscape.. An open and bright floor plan offers ample space to entertain with a generous Great Room leading to kitchen and dining areas. Kitchen features a walk-in pantry, granite countertops, culinary preparation island and choice of cabinets in white or stain grade. A first-floor bedroom with full bath and dedicated den or an optional expanded bedroom suite builds flexibility into the home. Upstairs, a master bedroom features a walk-in closet and relaxing bath with separate shower and soaking tub. A laundry room with cabinets and ContainIt! Closet storage, also upstairs, accommodates an active lifestyle. Distinguishing the townhome is a covered rear porch and large backyard ideal for outdoor dining. A two-car detached garage with launch area expedites comings and goings.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Trilogy at The Polo Club is an exclusive gated resort community that offers an active resort lifestyle on a more intimate scale.. Aimed at sophisticated buyers looking for a unique community in the heart of everything, you can help design the future of resort living. We invite you to learn more by visiting the Trilogy Living Vision™ Studio, now open daily.<!-- tagline: An exclusive resort community near Palm Springs, CA -->

Listing.Description: Introducing a whole new way to breathe easy and live large - welcome to the O Collection at Trilogy.. Inspired by the feeling of fresh air and open spaces, we've developed the O Collection to double the outdoor living experience. These unique five-home enclaves are designed around a lush green space. Each home includes a private courtyard that opens to a spacious park, creating a true sense of connection between the indoors, outdoors, homes and neighbors. These specialty parks will feature a variety of things to do, see and experience, and will become a natural outdoor destination for home owners to gather, get active and enjoy the desert's spectacular climate. Each home in the O Collection is designed to create a connection between indoor and outdoor living spaces, with a rolling wall of glass that opens to our newest innovation - Shea GreenSpace. By combining the land between two homes into one maximized side yard for each home, we're able to provide a much larger outdoor living experience. Shea GreenSpace offers a sweeping expanse of rear and side yards that make every every inch of real estate usable. Think dining spaces, fire pits, social gathering areas, dog play spots, water features, meditation nooks, herb gardens and more. The possibility of how you use your GreenSpace is limited only by your sense of fun and playfulness. You'll love your Outdoors Squared - O.

Inspired by the feeling of fresh air and open spaces, we've developed the O Collection to double the outdoor living experience. These unique five-home enclaves are designed around a lush green space. Each home includes a private courtyard that opens to a spacious park, creating a true sense of connection between the indoors, outdoors, homes and neighbors. These specialty parks will feature a variety of things to do, see and experience, and will become a natural outdoor destination for home owners to gather, get active and enjoy the desert's spectacular climate. Each home in the O Collection is designed to create a connection between indoor and outdoor living spaces, with a rolling wall of glass that opens to our newest innovation - Shea GreenSpace. Subdivision.SubdivisionName: Big Sky at Audie Murphy Ranch
Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
To visit from I-15 North or South, exit Railroad Canyon, which turns into Newport Road. Pass Goetz Road. Turn right on Derby Hill Drive, right on Stage Coach Road and left on Buckboard Lane. The models will be on your right.
To visit from I-215 North or South, exit Newport Road and go west. Proceed on Newport Road. Turn left on Derby Hill Drive, right on Stage Coach Road and left on Buckboard Lane. The models will be on your right.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Big Sky, an entirely new Brookfield Residential neighborhood, in the naturally majestic, master-planned community of Audie Murphy Ranch in Menifee is now open.. Brookfield Residential introduces the largest one- and two-story, single-family designs with a focus on family living. Homes are situated on large lots that are ideal for year-round activity, while thoughtful designs reveal expansive dining rooms for entertaining, generous spaces for crafting and home schooling, as well as large closets, abundant storage space, and 3 and 4-car oversized garages.
Set amidst spectacular rock formations, Big Sky at Audie Murphy Ranch offers a wonderful sense of peacefulness and tranquility. The neighborhood’s desirable location near the I-15 and I-215 freeways means you have easy access to employment centers, while nearby retail brings the convenience busy lives need. Big Sky at Audie Murphy Ranch in Menifee is now open and offers breathtaking new home designs coupled with a great Menifee location and serene surroundings that make you feel closer to nature.

Listing.Description: Good morning, Big Sky.. Enjoy the start of every day in your light- filled morning room. Or meander your way through the 3,937 square feet of spacious living space in this floor plan, featuring 5-6 bedrooms, 3-5.5 baths, a great room, dining room, alcove, flex room, 4-car garage with extra storage, an optional outdoor room with optional master deck, and plenty of laundry room to keep your home organized!

This stunning home features approximate 3,266 square feet of luxurious living set amidst beautiful rock formations in Menifee.. With five bedrooms, up to 4.5 bathrooms, a great room, gourmet kitchen, flex room (man cave, home office, play room, the ideas are endless), a master bedroom with walk-in closet, a roomy three-car garage with plenty of storage and more, this plan offers so much for a growing, active family.

Or meander your way through the 3,937 square feet of spacious living space in this floor plan, featuring 5-6 bedrooms, 3-5.5 baths, a great room, dining room, alcove, flex room, 4-car garage with extra storage, an optional outdoor room with optional master deck, and plenty of laundry room to keep your home organized!

Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
To visit from Highway 5, exit Via de La Valle and head east. Turn right on El Camino Real, left on San Diegueto Road, left on Camino Del Sur and right on Paseo del Sur. Right on Kristen Glen, left on Kristen View Court to arrive at Brookfield Sentinels.
To visit from Highway 56, exit Camino Del Sur and continue north. Turn right on Paseo Del Sur and right on Kristen Glen. Turn left on Kristen View Court to arrive at Brookfield Sentinels.
To visit from Highway 15, exit Camino Del Norte and head west. Continue onto Camino Del Sur. Turn left on Babcock, right on Paseo Del Sur and left on Kristen Glen. Turn left on Kristen View Court to arrive at Brookfield Sentinels.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Brookfield Sentinels at Del Sur presents a beautiful solution for those seeking the ease of single-level living.. Situated in the hills overlooking Rancho Santa Fe, this distinctive collection invites you to discover a new sought after Sentinels San Diego address. Brookfield Sentinels at Del Sur’s generously proportioned 3 to 4 bedroom, one and two-story designs echo the romance of Mediterranean authenticity both inside and out.
White washed exteriors are accented by a variety of details, including arched colonnades, bougainvillea and touches of wrought iron. Inside, arched doorways lead to open concept design innovation, chef’s-caliber kitchens and space-expanding courtyards and patios. First- and second-story private suites cater to personal luxury, including spa-inspired baths. In addition the homes are truly practical, with oversized garages and smart storage solutions. Be captivated by a new destination…welcome home. Brookfield Sentinels at Del Sur.

from Interstate 5, exit Cannon Rd. and head east. After you pass El Camino Real, turn left on Hilltop St. to arrive at The Foothills.
GPS Cross Streets: Glen Ave. and Ramsey Way
Subdivision.SubDescription:
The allure of coastal living, breathtaking elegance and a coveted new address can be yours.. The final new home opportunity within The Foothills, Palo Verde is a sought-after location in coastal-close Carlsbad. A rare residential destination to bask in the beauty of a comfortable, well-deserved, and healthy lifestyle. Private resort amenities within The Foothills offer a multitude of opportunities for leisure and recreation such as a swim club, barbeque facilities, and scenic walking trails. Miles of sandy beaches, just 3 miles away in coastal Carlsbad, along with fine dining, shopping, entertainment, and lush greens of renowned golf courses await.
Five single-family floorplans that include a desirable single-level residence will showcase a host of beautiful amenities such as romantic courtyards and outdoor rooms that epitomize indoor/outdoor living. With expansive open floorplans that feature flexibility for the future and inviting areas for gracious entertaining, Palo Verde at The Foothills will be the perfect place to live your wonderful life.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
To visit from the I-215 southbound, exit Scott Rd. and head east for 5 miles. Scott Rd. becomes Washington St. From Washington St. turn right onto Autumn Glen Circle and follow the signs to the Liberty model homes.
To visit from the I-15 freeway northbound, exit 79/Winchester Rd. and head east for 8 miles. Make a right on Abelia St. and follow the signs to the Liberty model homes.
To visit from the 1-15 freeway southbound, exit Murrieta Hot Springs Rd. and head east. Make a left turn on 79/Winchester Rd. and turn right on Abelia St. and follow the signs to the Liberty model homes.
GPS Cross Streets: Winchester Rd. and Abelia St.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Incredibly spacious homes, large yards and access to excellent Temecula schools underscore the family-oriented appeal of Liberty at Morningstar Ranch, a new neighborhood nestled just outside Temecula in French Valley.. Liberty at Morningstar Ranch offers impressively sized single-family designs and yards big enough for custom entertainment patios, swimming pools, Jacuzzis and children’s play equipment.
Liberty at Morningstar Ranch spacious interiors feature up to six bedrooms, including large secondary bedrooms with walk-in closets, first and second-floor master suite retreats, first-floor bedroom suites with private entrances, up to 5.5 baths and light-filled great rooms. Innovative outdoor covered rooms connect the family’s indoor and outdoor living space. Two, three and four-car garages offer the value and convenience of extra storage space for recreational vehicles and sports gear, while traditional driveways offer the perfect spot for your basketball hoop.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
From the I-5 freeway, take the 56 and head east. Exit Camino Del Sur and make a left. Follow this for approximately 6 miles. Make a right on Babcock St., a right on Tanner Ridge Rd. and follow signs all the way to the Descanso model homes at the end of Tanner Ridge Rd.
From the I-15 freeway, exit Camino Del Norte and head west. Turn left on Babcock St., a right on Tanner Ridge Rd. and follow signs all the way to the Descanso model homes at the end of Tanner Ridge Rd.
GPS Cross Streets: Babcock St and Tanner Ridge Rd.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Introducing Descanso at Del Sur, a new home collection graced with architectural beauty, located in highly sought-after Del Sur in North San Diego County.. This enclave of only 39 new homes is designed to embrace the aspirations of buyers who desire comfortable luxury and need space for growing families. Descanso San Diego features large living spaces open to popular outdoor rooms, on oversized homesites, most with open canyon views. All homes extend a natural invitation for children to play, friends to gather, and families to enjoy life with neighbors.
Interiors include great rooms, the centerpiece of social gatherings, and kitchens with oversized islands offering expansive seating. First-floor bedrooms and en-suite baths in all secondary bedrooms ensure needs are met for the growing family. Spacious second-floor family retreats are large enough to include a special play area for the kids. Master decks, interior courtyards and the naturally illuminated outdoor living rooms present inviting spaces that extend indoor/outdoor living. Welcome home to Descanso in San Diego.
New Homes in San Diego Luxury Family Homes Featuring great rooms, outdoor living rooms, downstairs bedrooms, en-suite bathrooms in all bedrooms, second floor family retreats, spa inspired master suites with optional decks, craft rooms, and more!

Listing.Description: A dramatic loggia brings a sense of arrival to this Descanso residence, where a charming courtyard offers the opportunity of relaxing to the sounds of a soothing fountain.. Parents will find the craft room the perfect spot for toddlers to express their creativity while they are close-by in the kitchen. A three-car garage has plenty of storage room, an important convenience.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
We're excited to be connecting Ontario Ranch to all the things you love and the roads to do so will be opening later this year. In the meantime, please reference the directions below to visit. We'll be expecting you!
To visit Holiday at New Haven in Ontario Ranch from the I-15, exit Cantu-Galleano Ranch Road and head west for 2 miles. Turn right on New Haven Drive and loop all the way around the roundabout to continue on New Haven Drive. Make a right on Yountville Drive. The Welcome House is located next to the model home on the left.
From the 60 Frwy, take the I-15 South and exit at Cantu-Galleano Ranch Road. New Haven is located 2 miles west along the new Ontario Ranch Road. Turn right on New Haven Drive and loop all the way around the roundabout to continue on New Haven Drive. Make a right on Yountville Drive. The Welcome House is located next to the model home on the left.
Subdivision.SubDescription: ntroducing Holiday, a brand new townhome community at New Haven in Ontario Ranch.. Holiday offers exciting ground-floor opportunities to own in a brand new master-planned community in the Inland Empire. Holiday’s one, two and three-bedroom floorplans have space to entertain, relax and spend quality time with family and friends. Six contemporary designs graced with authentic Spanish or Monterey-inspired architecture feature great rooms, modern kitchens, decks and patios (per plan). New Haven at Ontario Ranch offers homeowners a family-friendly lifestyle and a vibrant community setting brimming with parks, outdoor recreation and resort-style amenities for homeowners to play, socialize, relax and unwind. A central location near the 10 and 15 freeways, along with easy access to the 60, 210 and the Metrolink will be an important benefit for commuters. Eastvale Gateway is conveniently close-by for daily errands and Victoria Gardens is a short drive from the community. Students K-8 will attend the Mountain View School District and high school students will attend the Chaffey Etiwanda Joint Union School District.

Make another left on Alexander Avenue and Summerset is the second community on your right. The sales gallery is located at Residence One.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Introducing Summerset, a collection of brand new single-family homes at New Haven in Ontario Ranch.. Well-suited for growing families who aspire to a beautiful new residence, stylishly appointed floorplans feature impressive great rooms for daily gatherings, elegant dining rooms for entertaining and the privacy of up to five bedrooms. A large bonus room upstairs is ideal for playing games, crafts and hosting children’s slumber parties. Each Summerset home has an optional outdoor room that seamlessly blends indoor/outdoor living spaces.
New Haven at Ontario Ranch offers a family-friendly lifestyle and a vibrant community setting brimming with parks, outdoor recreation and resort-style amenities. Summerset presents a desirable opportunity for homebuyers to attain their personal goal of luxury homeownership within a superbly planned environment that is also conveniently close to Eastvale Gateway and Victoria Gardens. New Haven’s central location near the 10 and 15 freeways, along with easy access to the 60, 210 and the Metrolink will appeal to business and leisure travelers.

Make another left on Alexander Avenue and Waverly is the first community on your right.

Make another left on Alexander Avenue and Waverly is the first community on your right.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Introducing Waverly, a collection of brand new single-family homes at New Haven in Ontario Ranch.. Two-story floorplans are comfortably sized for a diversity of lifestyles, with the great room designed to be the centerpiece of daily interaction. The upstairs bonus room in the Residence Three is the perfect space for slumber parties with friends, a family game room or children’s play area. This bonus room is also featured as an optional fifth bedroom, a benefit for growing families.
New Haven at Ontario Ranch offers a vibrant community setting brimming with parks, outdoor recreation and resort-style amenities. Waverly debuts an outstanding opportunity for family-oriented homebuyers to achieve their goal of the American Dream within an environment that is also conveniently close to Eastvale Gateway and Victoria Gardens. Waverly at New Haven’s central location near the 10 and 15 freeways, along with easy access to the 60, 210 and the Metrolink will appeal to business and leisure travelers.

Elegant craftsmanship, with a perfect blend of modern and classic style, high-quality materials and top-of-the-line appliances and finishes, these estate homes make a grand statement.. A new home built by Pacific Legacy Homes begins with exceptional architectural design. The ultimate quality of a luxury home is very dependent on the components that are built into it. We use quality products from the nation’s top brand names that you know and trust.
Cabinetry is found throughout, most notably in the custom-built entertainment center in great room. Other quality materials include energy-efficient windows and doors, slab quartz counters, designer hardwood flooring and ancient travertine flooring. The Kitchen will convert most reluctant cook to a gourmet chef, with an array of appliances from brands like Wolf, Viking and Thermador. Of course, being in San Diego County, the home was designed with outdoor living in mind. Lounge on the patio with a glass of wine and enjoy the sunset. In a home so ideal for entertaining, your biggest challenge might be keeping the temperature-controlled wine cellar filled.
EcoWise Home Features Every home that we build includes energy-efficient and water-saving features. The energy saving features include the systems that are required to be a ENERGY STAR® Certified new home. The water saving features include the systems that are required to meet the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s WaterSense Program. Our new homes are designed to help save money, energy, and our natural resources. The Pacific Legacy Homes EcoWise Home Design is sustainable homebuilding
Welcome to Pacific Legacy Homes where we create distinctive homes for Inspired Living.

Listing.Description: The El Solario Collection consists of single-story estate residences with distinctive architecture and exquisite design.. Your choice of architectural styles that include: California Ranch and Spanish-Eclectic. Experience a sense of tranquility from the comfortable confines of the attractive interior or with nature in the courtyard retreats. The engaging family room and formal entertaining room provide spaces for get-togethers for any occasion. The luxurious master suite with its sitting area and the generous sized bedroom suites are located in a peaceful and relaxing living space. This residence features: an expansive master suite with spacious walk-in closet and bathroom with his-and-hers vanities, oversized oval Roman tub, and large shower enclosure, large secondary bedroom suites with bathrooms and walk-in closets; an oversized formal entertaining room with space for a formal dining room and parlor with adjacent butler's pantry for special gatherings; an expansive kitchen with large center island with built-in vegetable sink and counter eating space, walk-in pantry, double oven for creating culinary masterpieces; a large nook for semi-formal dining adjacent to the kitchen and family room; a spacious family room with built-in fireplace and media niche for enjoying a movie, sports event, or relaxing. This is a build on your lot residence. The base price excludes the price of the lot. For more information, visit us at www.pacificlegacyhomes.com.

The Solana Residence features your choice of architectural styles that include: California Ranch, Spanish-Eclectic, and French Country.. Experience a sense of tranquility from the comfortable confines of the attractive interior. Choose from 3 Interior Finish Packages to customize your new home according to your preferences. The engaging family room provides spaces for get-togethers for any occasion. The luxurious master suite with its generous sized bedroom suites are located in a peaceful and relaxing living space. This residence features: an expansive master suite with spacious walk-in closet and bathroom with his-and-hers vanities, oversized oval Roman tub, and large shower enclosure, large secondary bedroom with a shared bathroom and walk-in closets; a formal dining room for special gatherings; an expansive kitchen with large center island with counter eating space, walk-in pantry, double oven for creating culinary masterpieces; a large nook for semi-formal dining adjacent to the kitchen and family room; a spacious family room with built-in fireplace and media niche for enjoying a movie, sports event, or relaxing.; and a large 2-space garage. This is a build on your lot residence. The base price excludes the price of the lot. For more information, visit us at www.pacificlegacyhomes.com.

The Piedra Residence features your choice of architectural styles that include: California Ranch, Spanish-Eclectic, and French Country.. Experience a sense of tranquility from the comfortable confines of the attractive interior. Choose from 3 Interior Finish Packages to customize your new home according to your preferences. The engaging family room provides spaces for get-togethers for any occasion. The luxurious master suite with its generous sized bedroom suites are located in a peaceful and relaxing living space. This residence features: an expansive master suite with his-and-her spacious walk-in closets and bathroom with his-and-hers vanities, oversized oval Roman tub, and large shower enclosure, large secondary bedroom with a shared bathroom and walk-in closets; a formal dining room for special gatherings; an expansive kitchen with large center island with counter eating space, walk-in pantry, double oven for creating culinary masterpieces; a large nook for semi-formal dining adjacent to the kitchen and family room; a spacious family room with built-in fireplace and media niche for enjoying a movie, sports event, or relaxing.; and a large 2-space garage. This is a build on your lot residence. The base price excludes the price of the lot. For more information, visit us at www.pacificlegacyhomes.com.

Mid-Century Modern Architecture.. Two-story Residence on a 0.51 AC home site. Expansive and Breathtaking Ocean View. Located in the highly desirable Olde Carlsbad neighborhood.Close to shopping and schools.

The Neblina Residence is reminiscent of traditional coastal architecture.. The residence's design blends interior spaces with exterior spaces in a way that embodies coastal living. The one-story residence features a spacious gourmet kitchen with a large island for informal dining, a formal entertaining and dining space with fireplace, a parlor, a large master suite, a walk-in closet and luxurious master bath with large shower and his-and-hers vanities, and a outdoor lving room with a bar. The Neblina Residence is a Refashioned Home™ which means it includes energy-efficient upgrades to lower maintenance costs and improve its sustainability. The fully landscaped lot includes drought-tolerant plants and ground cover. Enjoy the view of the Agua Hediondo Lagoon Preserve from the backyard, outdoor living room, master suite, and formal entertain space. This home is walking distance to Kelly Elementary School and Laguna Riviera park. For more information, please call 858.756.1191 or visit us at pacificlegacyhomes.com.

The Mid-Century Modern architecture is reminiscent of the mid-20th Century movement of combining organic design with functional comfort and chic style.. The Meadowlark Residence emphasizes indoor-outdoor flow by bringing the outdoors in and the indoors out. The spacious design includes rooms for gathering, celebrating, and moments of reflection while enjoying the breathtaking ocean view. The elegant and smart design in a coveted coastal address can be yours. The is a rare Refashioned Home™ opportunity within the Seacrest Estates neighborhood in Olde Carlsbad. Two-story Residence on a 0.25 AC home site. Residence includes a Guest Suite with Kitchentte that can be converted to a Second Dwelling Unit for income. The Meadowlark Residence is a Refashioned Home™ so it includes: Energy-efficient features that are designed to save energy and WaterWise water-saving features that reduce usage and help save money. A Plug-in Vehicle charging station is included in the garage. Enjoy the breathtaking panoramic ocean view from both levels. Outside the home you will find WaterSmart landscaping and space to add a pool. Close to beaches, schools, dining, and shopping. The Meadowlark Residence is priced from $1,400,000. No HOA and No Mello-Roos. For more information, call us at 858.756.1191 or visit us at PacificLegacyHomes.com.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
From Interstate 5 Exit Lomas Santa Fe in Solana Beach. Travel east approximately 5 miles as Lomas Santa Fe becomes Linea Del Cielo. Continue through the Village of Rancho Santa Fe as the street becomes Paseo Delicias. Continue east approximately 3 miles as the road changes again to Del Dios Highway and turn left at Calle Ambiente.
From Interstate 15 Exit Valley Parkway (S6) in Escondido (Del Dios Highway). Travel west 7 miles and turn right at Calle Ambiente.
Please call our sales office for gate access.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Starting in the 1.3 millions, Estancia offers the height of luxury in San Diego County’s most prestigious community -- the ultimate for homebuyers seeking the finest appointments, lavish amenities and a sought-after address. Live surrounded by the natural beauty that has drawn people to this area for decades -- commanding views of rolling foothills, canyons and wooded meadows, and many biking and walking trails that let you immerse yourself in the experience.Introducing EstanciaTour the Models View Residence 2A Tour View Residence 4B TourNew to Rancho Santa Fe? We’ve prepared a Newcomers Guide to introduce you to this prestigious community.. Read on and learn all that Rancho Santa Fe has to offer. Learn More about Rancho Santa Fe Explore the quaint charms of Rancho Santa Fe village, home to exquisite boutiques and award-winning gourmet restaurants. Or be at the coast in less than five minutes and take your pick of dining, shopping and fun including the Del Mar Racetrack, Torrey Pines hikes and glorious beaches. If you have school-aged children, Rancho Santa Fe and surrounding communities offer several prestigious private schools from which to choose. Rancho Santa Fe is one of North San Diego County’ most centrally located communities. With easy access to I-5 and I-15, you’ll enjoy a comfortable commute to major job centers in Sorrento Valley, Rancho Bernardo, Poway and Del Mar. San Diego Luxury Homes Estancia offers a selection of homes on generously sized sites, with luxe standard appointments and the opportunity to add your personal style signature with a range of options and upgrades from our Design Studio.

Listing.Description: Estancia Residence Four X was designed for the discerning homeowner.. Spacious and airy, it is at once deliciously livable and luxurious. Inside the impressive interior, you’re met with a flowing expanse that encompasses a stunning kitchen and adjacent dining room and a spacious great room with fireplace. In the gourmet kitchen, you’ll find ample counter space, a large working island and a walk-in pantry. To round out this floor we’ve also included a beautiful master suite with bedroom, dual vanity bathroom and walk-in closet. Subdivision.SubDescription: Lovely homes, great amenities, excellent schools and proximity to shopping and entertainment.. These attributes and many more will make IVY at Carmel Valley an ideal place to call home in San Diego.About the Homes IVY features charming homes with 1,985 to 2,256 square feet of living space. The 3- and 4-bedroom homes will include 2.5 and 3 baths and 2-car garages. Residence Two Residence ThreeNew to San Diego? We’ve prepared a Newcomers Guide to introduce you to this vibrant city. Read on and learn all that San Diego has to offer. Learn More about San DiegoAround Town Fun will come easy here. IVY residents will have access to a state-of-the-art community recreation center. When the great outdoors calls, hiking and biking trails are within walking distance in a 1,300-acre natural preserve. Feel like shopping? The nearby Village retail complex offers a world of opportunity for shopping, dining and entertainment. Here you’ll find popular draws like Trader Joe’s and Panera Bread, and you might want to stop by Starbucks for a latte. Many other fine destinations are coming soon, including a workout facility and a juice bar. The shops, grocery stores and services of La Jolla and Del Mar are a few minutes away. Just five miles from the Pacific Ocean, IVY is close to the 15, 5 and 56 freeways so commutes are easy. Major tech employment hubs, from Qualcomm and Pfizer Pharmaceuticals to Websense and Optimer Pharmaceuticals are nearby in Sorrento Valley. Home FeaturesTwo-story Single-Family Homes1,985 to 2,256 Sq. Ft.3 - 4 Bedrooms2.5 - 3 Baths2 Car GaragesPriced from the lower $700sSchools Parents will appreciate being able to send their students to the outstanding schools of the San Dieguito and Del Mar Union Unified School District.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Now is the perfect opportunity to live in the premier community of Carmel Valley in San Diego.. Elms at Carmel Valley is an enclave of beautiful homes that speak to homebuyers’ desire for quality, livability and fine living.About the Homes Elms at Carmel Valley offers spacious two-story homes. Square footage ranges from 2,768 to 3,190. Each of the three floor plans features four bedrooms, three baths and a two-car garage. These impeccable designs include an open living area with a designer kitchen and large great room. Homes are priced from the upper 900s to the low millions. Elms residents will take pleasure in a host of amenities, and nature lovers will appreciate the 1,300-acre natural preserves with a network of hiking and biking trails is within walking distance. Introducing Elms Residence One Residence Two Residence ThreeNew to San Diego? We’ve prepared a Newcomers Guide to introduce you to this vibrant city. Read on and learn all that San Diego has to offer. Learn More about San DiegoHome FeaturesTwo-story single-family homes2,768 to 3,178 square feet4 - 5 bedrooms3 - 4 baths2 car garagesPriced from the upper $900sLocale Located less than five miles from the coast, Carmel Valley is one of the most desirable locales in North San Diego. Elms will put homeowners close to shopping and entertainment, major employment hubs, and high-ranking schools. The grocery stores, service outlets and specialty stores of La Jolla and Del Mar can be reached by car in just minutes. Near Elms, the new Village at Pacific Highlands Ranch offers Starbucks, Panera Bread and Trader Joe’s. The Santa Barbara-style complex will also feature fine and casual dining, boutiques and a host of other retailers and essential services.

Listing.Description: The Residence One floor plan, one of our new homes for sale in Carmel Valley, has the flexibility and desirable features you’re looking for.. The expansive open concept first level includes an inviting great room with fireplace, unique curved prep-and-eat kitchen island and loads of counter space. The airy openness lets you socialize with guests or family with ease. A first-floor bedroom with full bath can easily become your home office or a guest room. The owner’s suite on the second level is a welcome retreat and feature a large walk-in-closet and master bath with separate tub, walk-in shower with seat, enclosed commode and twin lavatories. The upstairs laundry room with utility sink and linen storage adds convenience.

Looking for new San Diego North County homes?. Don’t miss the Residence Two floor plan at Elms. This thoughtfully-designed open concept plan is the perfect place for your family and friends to gather for meals or to hang out together, and easily adapts to your needs. Work at home or pursue a hobby from the first-floor office. The second-floor owner's suite features a foyer for additional privacy and room-size walk-in closet. The master bath includes a soaking tub and walk-in shower. Other features include a loft or optional fifth bedroom.

This thoughtfully designed open concept plan is the perfect place for your family and friends to gather for meals or to hang out together, and easily adapts to your needs. Expand your view with optional panorama doors at the great room or add a second fireplace. Work at home or pursue a hobby from the first-floor office. Include an optional entry door on the downstairs bedroom to add convenience for an older child or guest. If flexible space and plenty of it is on your new San Diego home wish list, our Residence One floor plan is just the ticket, combining smart design and style.. This open concept first floor flows together to create an ideal gathering spot. The great room with fireplace and optional panorama doors flows in the dining area with optional cabinets. The gourmet kitchen features a prep-and-dine island, roomy walk-in pantry and a home management center that’s perfect for organizing the household. The second-floor owner’s suite has 2 walk-in closets and a luxurious master bath with soaking tub, w-in shower with seat, dual vanities and an enclosed commode. There’s also bonus room that can easily become your tech headquarters, a balcony off bedroom 2 and a convenient upstairs laundry room.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Live at Seagrove in desirable Carlsbad and your friends will envy your exciting new lifestyle.. This North Coastal San Diego County enclave of only 47 stylish town homes sits within a mere one-quarter of a mile from the blue waters of the Pacific Ocean.Introducing SeagroveView Our Model Tours Residence B1 Residence B2New to Carlsbad?
Carlsbad is connected to San Diego to the south and Orange/Los Angeles to the north by the LOSSAN commuter rail line and, in the near future, the Amtrak Surfliner. If you’d rather commute to work or play by car, the 5 Freeway is just a quarter-mile from Seagrove. We’ve prepared a Newcomers Guide to introduce you to this beautiful city. Read on and learn all that Carlsbad has to offer. Learn More about Carlsbad
The finely-appointed live/work town homes of Seagrove will put you within a short walk to the charming shops and entertainment venues of Carlsbad Village. Stroll down to explore street-side art exhibits, buy fresh produce at the weekly State Street Farmer’s Market and enjoy live music here during Friday Night Live. Whenever the ocean calls, you can grab your board and head to the local surf spotsThe Homes Seagrove floor plans will offer three three-story homes and one two-bedroom. Each includes quality standard features and materials.2 to 3 bedrooms and den2 full baths and 2 half baths815 to 2,364 Sq. Ft.Second level balconyPrivate rooftop deckOpen-concept kitchen and living roomLarge master suite with walk-in closet2-car garageOne 2-story floor plan without balcony or roof deck features 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, 832 square feet, an open-concept living area, and a 1-car garage.
You’ll appreciate your ground floor office with its own powder room. Upstairs on the second level the open-living area encompasses a sleek designer kitchen, dining area and roomy living room with sliders out to the balcony.

Listing.Description: Coastal casual at its best with plenty of style points, flexibility and storage.. The Seagrove B1 floor plan, from our collection of Carlsbad new homes at Seagrove, will wow you. Quit your commute and work from home in the spacious first level office with powder room. The second level is an open plan with an inviting deck off the living area and den that’s perfect for guests or hobbies. Your owner’s suite is a nice retreat on the third level, complete with two closets, one of them a walk-in, linen storage and master bath with enclosed commode and large walk-in shower with spa seating. The secondary bedroom is down the hall and also has its own full bath. Head upstairs to watch the stars from your roof-top deck.

Live, play, work, and never leave home.. If that’s your idea of California dreaming, welcome home to Seagrove C1, new Carlsbad homes for sale at Seagrove. Cut your commute to about 30 seconds when you open up shop in the first-level office space. Chill out or show-off your culinary chops in the open-plan second level. Guests will also be impressed with the balcony views. Need a den for relaxing or a third bedroom? In this flexible plan it’s up to you. Retreat to your third-level owner’s suite that includes two closets (one’s a roomy walk-in) and twin lavatories, linen storage, enclosed commode and walk-in shower with spa seat at the master bath. Practice your yoga or do a little star gazing from your private roof deck. Life is good here, isn’t it?

A spacious great room with an optional corner fireplace flows into the large kitchen with eat-at island, corner pantry and breakfast nook. The secluded master suite is highlighted by an roomy walk-in closet with optional access to the laundry room.

This inviting two-story home with 4 bedrooms, 2.5 baths and two-car garage showcases a spacious great room that opens to center island kitchen ideal for gathering with friends and family.. A upstairs loft provides perfect play room for kids. Master suite includes large walk-in closet and five-piece bath with soaking tub and optional access to the convenient upstairs laundry room.

This flexible home with 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths and a three bay tandem garage features a spacious open great room with island kitchen and oversized breakfast nook.. The upstairs with large game room and convenient laundry offers plenty of ways to customize your living space with options that include a main floor guest suite or a fourth bedroom upstairs. Up to 6 bedrooms available.

Prepare dinner at the expansive kitchen island that opens into the great room.. The downstairs master suite features a sizable bath and large walk-in closet. Invite friends over to watch the big game in the sprawling second floor media room. Down the hall, a guest bedroom with walk-in closet and adjoining bath comfortably accommodate overnight visitors.

Spacious great room, dining area and open kitchen with eat-at island make this home perfect for entertaining. With a convenient pocket office, it makes working from home easy. The large master suite has five-piece bath and an oversized walk-in closet.

Extraordinary ranch plan includes 4 bedrooms, 3 baths, and a three-car tandem garage.. The spacious great room opens to the dining area and kitchen, ideal for entertaining or everyday living. The kitchen overlooks a beautiful courtyard ideal for family dinners outside. Luxurious master suite includes five-piece bath and large walk-in closet.

This inviting two-story home includes 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths and a three-car tandem garage.. The open great room, formal dining room and kitchen make this home extremely functional and great for family gatherings. Upstairs, you will find a large game room. The secluded master suite with walk-in closet and luxurious five-piece bath is a perfect place to unwind.

Elegant plan with 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, formal dining room, den, loft and three car garage.. An impressive great room opens to the spacious kitchen complete with center island and walk-in pantry. The master bedroom includes five-piece bath with oval soaking tub and large walk-in closet. Upstairs laundry, owners entry and pocket office add convenience to this home.

Elegant plan with 5 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, formal dining room, den, & three car garage.. An impressive great room opens to the spacious kitchen with a center island and walk-in pantry. The master bedroom includes five-piece bath and large walk-in closet.

This beautiful home features a gorgeous kitchen with white cabinets, slab granite countertops, stainless steel appliances with a double oven, and a large island.. Tile floors and a covered patio complete this home.

Listing.Description: This home includes a stylish kitchen with KitchenAid stainless steel appliances, maple cabinets, granite countertops and walk-in pantry that opens to a large California room and dining.
This home has it all - private den, formal dining room, butler's pantry, walk-in pantry, kitchen island , California room, spacious loft and beautiful maple cabinets.

A covered front porch welcomes you into this two- story home that includes 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, den, loft, covered patio and 3-bay garage.. Enjoy entertaining in the open-concept main floor with the great room and kitchen open into an expansive California room. Upstairs, the luxurious master suite is located in the back of the home for added privacy and includes a spacious walk-in closet. The Lorraine gives you the flexibility to convert the downstairs den to a junior suite, perfect for guests or older children.

The Monterey includes 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, den, spacious loft, California room and 3-bay garage.. Upon entering you are greeted by a private courtyard for relaxing outdoor living. Inside, the open great room flows into the kitchen complete with a large eat-at island, walk-in pantry and garage access through to owner's entry. As you move upstairs the loft offers a flexible space for relaxing or entertaining. A luxury master suite complete with walk-in closets and large soaking tub complete this home. This home has up to 5 optional bedrooms to fit your needs.

Our largest two-story home features 4 bedrooms, 4.5 baths, den, formal dining room, upstairs loft, covered patio and 3-car garage.. Both the den and formal dining room are located in the front of the home making for an impressive entrance. The gourmet kitchen offers an expansive rounded island, walk-in pantry, butler's pantry and nook. Upstairs, the luxurious master bath includes two walk-in closets, dual vanities, and extra windows for natural light. The downstairs den has the option to convert to a guest suit making room for the entire family.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Arrow Station is an modern community of urban residences and single family homes in Montclair.. Just a walk away from the Metrolink, Arrow Station features a clubhouse, pool and outdoor spaces.

Listing.Description: The main level boasts a spacious kitchen with granite countertops opening to the living room.. The lower level features a bedroom with walk in closet and full bath. The secluded Master suite is the whole upper level with large walk in closet.

Sip your morning coffee on the private patio off of the master suite.. A guest bedroom and bath gives overnight visitors their own space. Downstairs, the open kitchen/dining/living room creates a modern, airy feel.

A single car garage with laundry offers in-home urban convenience.. Upstairs, the open concept living space seamlessly blends the kitchen and family room. A giant master walk-in closet creates an abundance of storage.

Unwind after a long day in the second floor master suite.. Separation from the two third floor bedrooms adds a layer of privacy. Downstairs, the well-appointed kitchen flows seamlessly into the spacious living room.

Comfortably host overnight visitors in the first floor guest suite.. Upstairs, the open living space is perfect for entertaining. The third floor master boasts tons of natural light, four-piece bath and large walk-in closet.

Invite the neighbors over for the big game.. Prepare your seven-layer dip without missing a single play thanks to clear sightlines between the kitchen and great room. The second floor master features a five-piece ensuite.

His-and-hers closets in the master suite finally put an end to the battle over shelf space.. Get to work in the large pocket office. Downstairs, the giant kitchen island is great for enjoying a snack or tackling homework.

Listing.Description: This home is perfect for entertaining with its open style great room and kitchen.. Upstairs, enjoy the luxury of the large soak tub and separate shower in the master bath. Large secondary bedrooms complete this home with plenty of space for the family.

The wide-open main floor living space brings everyone together without feeling crowded.. In the kitchen, an asymmetrical island lends a uniquely modern touch and makes a great breakfast bar or buffet. The first floor bedroom is ideal for guests and is situated only steps away from the full three-piece bath. Upstairs, hallway built-ins help maintain order and two good-sized bedrooms share a bathroom with double sink. A spacious en-suite compliments the master and features dual sinks and a separate tub/shower.

Hold holiday meals or simple weeknight dinners in the spacious dining room.. Open access to the kitchen makes for simple and quick setup and cleanup. Prep food at the sprawling island or use it as an appetizer buffet. Overnight visitors will appreciate the convenience of the first floor guest room and full bath. Work from home or knock out homework in the pocket office at the top of the stairs. Across the hall, the master suite features a luxurious ensuite complete with dual sinks and a separate tub/shower.

Loads of counter space and a uniquely shaped "baseball diamond" island compliment this gourmet kitchen.. A convenient first floor guest room and full bath are situated at the front of the home. The second story features a spacious loft and pocket office to be customized according to your family's needs. The secondary bedrooms are each equipped with a walk-in-closet and share access to a dual vanity and attached full bath. The master suite is flanked by a spacious five-piece bath and giant walk-in closet.

Listing.Description: This home has it all - the spacious great room opens to a covered back patio.. The kitchen features maple cabinets, slab granite counters, stainless steel appliances, double basin sink, and double oven.

Forget having to park on the street thanks to this home's spacious three-car tandem garage.. Store all of your outdoor toys and still have room for the cars. Just inside, equip the owner's entry with optional cabinets to help maintain order. Clear sightlines throughout the main level create a bright and welcoming ambiance. Upstairs, the versatile media room is ideal for watching the big game or keeping the kids entertained. Across the hall, large windows and a luxurious ensuite compliment the master bedroom.

Fire up the grill and invite the neighbors over for a BBQ under the covered back patio.. Plenty of prep space at the nearby kitchen island makes transferring dishes easy. Dine outside or in with ample casual seating at the breakfast bar and in the nook. At the top of the stairs, a versatile loft makes a great media center or playroom for the kids. The study is ideal for homework or answering emails. The master suite boasts a cavernous walk-in closet and well-appointed bath with dual sinks and garden tub.

A wide-open floor plan seamlessly blends the kitchen with the dining and great rooms for modern living.. Prepare dinner at the large island while keeping an eye on the kids. Down the hall, the main floor master suite is outfitted with a large, five-piece bath and spacious walk-in closet. Two secondary bedrooms feature walk-in closets of their own and split a separate full bathroom. Upstairs, the fourth bedroom is ideal for guests or older children. The game/media room makes a great "man cave" or play area.

Host holiday gatherings or casual weeknight dinners in the formal dining room.. Located adjacent to the open concept living space, optional French doors lend a touch of elegance. Elsewhere in this ranch-style floor plan, the master suite features a spacious bath with his-and-hers sinks and an impressive walk-in closet with optional laundry room access. Two secondary bedrooms split another full bath, while the powder room is great for guests. Work from home or manage household operations from the pocket office.

Dust off the board games and rally the family for game night in the second floor rec room.. Down the hall, the master suite is equipped with his-and-hers sinks and a garden tub. Each of the secondary bedrooms features a walk-in closet for added storage. Downstairs, an open floor plan and plenty of natural light creates a bright and welcoming space. A seamless transition between the kitchen and great room means the cook doesn't have to miss out on the action. Use the den as a home office or reading nook.

Subdivision.SubdivisionName: Upper Cielo in Rancho Santa Fe
Subdivision.DrivingDirections: Exit Lomas Santa Fe in Solana Beach. Travel east approximately 5 miles as Lomas Santa Fe becomes Linea Del Cielo. Continue through the Village of Rancho Santa Fe as the street becomes Paseo Delicias. Continue east approximately 3 miles as the road changes again to Del Dios Highway and turn left at Calle Ambiente. Turn right into Cielo Village (prior to gate). Turn right in the parking lot and proceed to the Sales Information Center where they will provide you with gate access and a map with directions to Ravello models. From Interstate 15: Exit Valley Parkway (S6) in Escondido (Del Dios Highway). Travel west 7 miles and turn right at Calle Ambiente. Turn right into Cielo Village (prior to gate). Turn right in the parking lot and proceed to the Sales Information Center where they will provide you with gate access and a map with directions to Ravello models.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Upper Cielo offers forty-one custom inspired residences at the top of CIELO with infinity views and a profound sense of privacy and natural exclusivity.. We invite you to come walk the land and stand out over the edges to discover the subtleties that define each homesite. Each has a soul all their own with a profound sense of calm, time and space. From there, explore your floorplan and room options, select from an endless array of finishes, and create the home you've always dreamed of. And if you are one of the fortunate few to make this your home, you’ll notice something very special about this place- the magical characteristics of light and shadow. This is the kind of place where you wake up, and you see something you’ve never seen before- you feel something you’ve never felt before, one day after another, until you realize there’s never a moment when you’re not in touch with something beautiful.
The community of CIELO is an exclusive community of spectacular luxury homes and custom homesites which occupies one of the highest vantage points along the San Diego coast, providing an unprecedented portal to sweeping views that stretch from the Coronado Islands and La Jolla to Lake Hodges and the coastal mountains. Beginning with the Gate House, which is manned 24 hours a day, you will find that CIELO is a community of preeminence and prestige. At Club Cielo, these qualities are enhanced by an array of private recreational amenities including a community pool and spa, two tennis courts, a fitness center and much more.

Your Home Should Feel Personal To You – Introducing Forty-Nine Custom Inspired Residences. Southern Preserve is a limited collection of new custom inspired residences overlooking the rolling hills of Olivenhain. Come walk the land, feel the coastal breezes, enjoy the view orientations, explore your floorplan and room options, and select from an endless array of design finishes to create the home of your dreams. Up to 6 Bedrooms & 6.5 Bathrooms. From the Low $1 Millions.

Subdivision.Agent: a New Homes Advisor TRI Pointe Homes
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Topazridge features a limited edition of graceful single-story homes in an intimate, gated master planned community at a convenient Riverside location.. Come explore these ultra spacious, irresistible luxury homes—up to 6 bedrooms and 4 baths with formal entry and dining rooms, great room, three-car garage, and much more. Choose from sophisticated open-plan designs with a long list of exceptional price-included features.
Brand new finishes and quality appointments add to the appeal of a new home at Topazridge. From front yard landscaping to the gourmet kitchen with new appliances and smart storage, you’ll find plenty to love here. Plus, a great location in the gated community of Riverwalk Vista promises a full and active lifestyle with its walking trails, pool, and parks. You're also close to the Metrolink station and major freeways. With everything that Topazridge offers and everything else nearby, it's the ideal place to call home.

Listing.Description: Private cul-de-sac location in a master-planned community!. Find ultimate comfort in this 5-bedroom, 3-bath home with approximately 3,773 square feet, 3-car garage and the modern finishes only found in a new home. The heart of the home features great room design open to a gorgeous kitchen with Shaker cabinets in maple, Santa Cecilia granite countertops, generously sized island with eating bar and stainless steel Whirlpool appliances. Luxurious spaciousness features formal and informal dining, a study and a downstairs bedroom and full bath. A grand curved staircase leads upstairs to a bonus room for additional play space. The private master suite is spa-inspired with granite-topped vanities, soaking tub and separate shower and dual walk-in closets. Located within the gated community of Riverwalk Vista, this Topazridge home has access to a recreation area with resort-style pool, spa and children’s wading pool. Additional community amenities include parks, playground areas, and a community barbecue station area. Riverwalk Vista is accessible to the CA-91 and community conveniences such as groceries, gas station, and a myriad of casual restaurants and coffee shops. Within minutes of the Galleria at Tyler for upscale shopping and dining choices, this home at Topazridge offers an exciting new lifestyle. Visit today to see firsthand!

Subdivision.Agent: a New Homes Advisor TRI Pointe Homes
Subdivision.SubDescription:
A stylish collection of townhomes in Temecula, Alegre features two- and three-story attached residences measuring approximately 1,519 to 1,734 square feet, including 2 to 4 bedrooms and 2.5 baths.. In addition to functional living and dining rooms, each home includes a versatile loft or office that may be selected as an optional extra bedroom. Two-car garages are accessed from each building's central motorcourt.
These sophisticated, airy, easy-to-care-for townhomes are minutes from charming Old Town Temecula and wine country—the perfect complement to a busy, multi-tasking life in search of relaxation and balance. The community recreation center boasts a resort-style pool, spa, children’s wading pool and park with play equipment. And major retailers, including supermarkets and home improvement centers, are just a short drive away along Temecula Parkway.
Less "have to’s", more "want to’s." That’s what life at Alegre is all about.

Listing.Description: Live in a wonderfully unique three-story design with a private bedroom and bath suite with patio on the first floor.. Plank-style laminate flooring unifies the spacious living area on the second level with living room, tech area, dining room and kitchen. And a third level is reserved for a generous private master suite. Enjoy fine amenities in the modern kitchen for easy meal preparation with stylish island, white cabinetry, New Caledonia granite countertops with 3 x 6 travertine backsplash and upgraded Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances. You’ll want to retreat to the elegant master suite after a busy day to enjoy a walk-in closet and elegant bath with separate tub, quartz countertops and tile selections in Current Cream from the Concrete Chic(TM) line. Come home to elegance plus a world of recreation at the resort-style pool, spa, playground and much more.

Subdivision.Agent: a New Homes Advisor TRI Pointe Homes
Subdivision.SubDescription: Welcome to carefree, casual and cool.. Welcome to Aldea at Paseo del Sol in Temecula—an enclave of sophisticated, airy, easy-to-care-for townhomes, perfect for first-time homebuyers. Relax comfortably and stylishly in your two-story, 2 or 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath with attached two-car garage Aldea townhome—only minutes from Old Town Temecula and its majestic wine country. Find your fun at the community recreation center with a resort-style pool, spa, children's wading pool, and Paloma del Sol Park with play equipment. Come see how you can live away from it all and still have everything you need at Aldea.

Listing.Description: Retreat to the rolling hills and relaxed charm of Temecula.. This is your chance to live in the modern neighborhood of Aldea and be surrounded by wine country, festivals, balloon rides and Old Town adventure. Homesite 35 boasts 1,218 sq. ft., 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths and private enclosed patio. Gorgeous tile flooring throughout the downstairs living area sets a neutral backdrop. The well-appointed kitchen has Santa Cecilia granite countertops and backsplash, upgraded Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, and a peninsula for extra prep space and casual dining. You’ll enjoy the convenience of an upstairs laundry room and the calming nature of the master suite complete with elegant Piedrafina countertops. The community features a resort-style pool, spa, children’s wading pool, tot lot, beautifully landscaped parkways and areas for barbequing. It’s the perfect way to enjoy the low-maintenance lifestyle while living in the picturesque wine country of Temecula.

Subdivision.Agent: a New Homes Advisor TRI Pointe Homes
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Here at Kite Ridge at Sycamore Creek, the beauty of nature is everywhere.. There’s the stunning backdrop of the Cleveland National Forest and earth tones of the residences. There are outdoor trails meandering through native vegetation.
Welcome to a thriving community with convenient amenities and natural surroundings. Kite Ridge at Sycamore Creek is a stunning example of smart, contemporary design with the finest attention to detail at every turn.
Kite Ridge is a new collection of single-family detached, two-story homes at Sycamore Creek in Corona. Its convenient location allows easy access to The Shops at Dos Lagos, a 70+ acre nature preserve, scenic trails, recreational amenities and schools.
Make Kite Ridge at Sycamore Creek the next place you'll want to call home.

Listing.Description: Located on a cul de sac, allows for all kinds of playtime.. It's all here, from spacious entertainment areas of a great room with fireplace and a covered outdoor California Room to the surrounding modern kitchen and dining area for today's lifestyles. A multi-functional, centered gourmet island with seating in the kitchen will bring family and friends together, and features include granite Giallo Ornamental counters with backsplash, a spacious walk-in pantry, home management center with built-in desk, built-in recycle bin and sparkling built-in Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances - 36 gas cooktop with 5 sealed burners, 30 self-cleaning wall oven, microwave and Energy Star dishwasher. You'll have a convenient downstairs bedroom with full bath. There is beautiful recessed panel maple cabinetry throughout and if you act now there is still time to select your flooring. Plenty of room for all family members is presented on the second level with spacious bonus room, laundry room, two secondary bedrooms and a luxurious, natural light-filled master suite with large walk-in closet. The elegant, spa-inspired bath is your haven for relaxation featuring a rectangle soaking tub, separate ceramic-tiled shower, E-Stone counters with backsplash and dual vanities.

Come home to the privacy of a cul de sac location and the spaciousness and elegance of an open living design.. Entertain in style or spend quality time with family in the expanded, large great room, inviting gourmet kitchen and fireplace warmed dining room. You’ll delight in the modern kitchen highlighted by a center island with seating, granite Giallo Ornamental counters and backsplash, large walk-in pantry, and premier Whirlpool® stainless steel appliances. The lower level is a sought-after downstairs bedroom with bath, and the two-car garage provides that extra storage space you’ve always wanted. Relax or play upstairs, featuring a spacious bonus room, two secondary bedrooms, one with its own walk-in closet, and a private master suite. Large walk-in master closet and spacious compartmentalized bath with rectangular soaking tub, separate shower, E-Stone counters and dual vanities. A long list of quality features includes recessed panel maple cabinetry throughout, added recessed lighting in the master bedroom, bonus room and great room, two panel Carrera interior doors and there’s still time to select your flooring to fit perfectly with your style. A very rewarding life in a remarkable place can be yours if you act now before it’s gone.

Located at the entry to a cul de sac, unbeatable value is apparent throughout the home with a full spectrum of outstanding features and there’s still time to select your flooring.. A large great room with fireplace flows seamlessly into the gourmet kitchen with center island for seating and dining area, all to enhance both casual or more formal get-togethers. Located off the kitchen is a home management center with built-in desk to keep you organized, along with abundant cabinets and a convenient walk-in pantry. A full stainless steel Whirlpool® modern appliance package includes a 36” gas cooktop with 5 sealed burners, 30” self-cleaning wall oven, built-in microwave and Energy Star dishwasher. The downstairs bedroom and bath makes life convenient, as does extra storage area in the two-car garage. Gorgeous master suite with his and hers walk-in closets and spacious compartmentalized spa-inspired bath with rectangular soaking tub, separate tiled shower, E-Stone counters and dual vanities. A bonus room adds a place for some fun or downtime. The whole family will find ways to enjoy the area’s amenities.
