Subdivision.SubDescription:
As you enter the private gates of Sedona at Parkside in Ontario, you'll immediately notice the Spanish and Tuscan-inspired neighborhood architecture, and the terrain of the Cucamonga-Guasti Regional Park and Victoria Gardens serving as a natural backdrop.. Inside, you are welcomed by large living spaces, warm natural light, and a natural lifestyle flow. Plenty of space for kids to play and guests to feel comfortable. The quality and details stand out as you peruse the kitchen and island, outdoor space, and upstairs rooms. There’s an abundance of features, quality finishing, and crafted style at every turn.
This is Sedona. A contemporary collection of gated homes ranging from 1,462 to 1,749 sq. ft. with three bedrooms and 2.5 baths, in a variety of floor plan options. It’s a community with amenities like a pool and cabana for you and your neighbors to enjoy. The privacy of a gated community, at the affordability you were hoping for—prices start at the mid $300,000’s. Don’t miss out on this opportunity for low maintenance living, perfect for 1st time homeowners and relaxation enthusiasts.

Listing.Description: This stylish townhome has an ideal, north-facing location with an inviting front patio, and offers a fresh, open-plan design just perfect for families.. The charming architecture features window shutters and unexpected touches, like ornamental wrought iron details. It’s an extraordinary value that incorporates quality finishes, maple door cabinets and a ceramic tile entry. The gleaming kitchen with a central island looks out onto the dining area and Great Room, and boasts elegant granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Upstairs, the Master Suite features his and her vanities, beveled mirror detail and a rectangular soaking tub. A second bedroom could serve as a functional home office if you prefer, and the third bedroom includes a spacious walk-in closet. There’s a 2-car garage with direct access, a tankless water heater and other earth-friendly and energy efficient features. Relax here within your own gated community, and live conveniently close to freeways and nearby destinations like Ontario Mills and Victoria Gardens with many shopping, entertainment and dining options. You’ll find many exclusive amenities, including Parkside’s recreation center, neighborhood pool and walking trails.

The open, free-flowing nature of this townhome's floor plan makes it the perfect space to relax, entertain, unwind and style as you like.. The architecture features Spanish characteristics like terracotta tiling, wrought iron details, and charming window shutters. Inside, an inviting kitchen welcomes guests up to the kitchen island to see what's cooking. They’ll admire the granite countertops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and sleek gas range. Those signature dishes are just waiting to be dished up. The kitchen opens up to the dining room and great room, creating a large, open space to mingle, host holidays, and enjoy the heart of the home. Upstairs you'll find two bedrooms and a convenient laundry room with optional sink, along with another bedroom-or, turn it into a place to play, paint, work, or relax. Down the hall, the master suite boasts his and her vanities and spacious walk-in closet. Enjoy the privacy of your own gated community, close to shopping, dining, entertainment and freeways. Work up a sweat on the walking trails or nearby regional park, then plunge into the community pool. It’s all here at Sedona. And it’s all ready for you.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
The exceptional neighborhood of Kensington at Park Place features timeless style, crafted details, and airy, versatile floorplans, perfect for family and festive gatherings.. It's conveniently located in Ontario, next to mountains, lakes and major freeways.
These detached, two-story residences offer abundant spaciousness and beautifully crafted features throughout. It's the ideal setting for family memories, holiday get-togethers, cozy movie nights, and growing families. The floorplans offer 4-6 bedrooms and 3-4 baths in approximately 3,078 to 3,415 square feet.
The community of Park Place boasts The Park House, an amazing recreation and social hub that has to be seen to be believed. A proposed elementary school and nearby work, shopping and transportation hubs all promise a convenient and rewarding setting for life in the 21st century.
Timely and timeless. That’s what sets this charming, welcoming neighborhood apart.

Listing.Description: This graceful Andalusian-inspired home is the epitome of timeless style.. Archways, glazed tile accents, classic proportions evoke the residential architecture of Ontario's historic neighborhoods. Beyond the elegant façade you'll discover a surprisingly open interior, with one large Great Room encompassing family, dining and kitchen areas, with an oversized island anchoring the expanse. A downstairs bedroom retreat and bonus garage storage both provide an abundance of adaptive opportunities. Upstairs an impressive Master Suite featuring soaking tub and large walk-in closet is adjoined by a huge loft, waiting for your imagination to turn it into the ultimate entertainment center, game room, studio, study or home gym. A generous laundry room provides ample upstairs storage along with a basin sink. Both second floor secondary bedrooms boast walk-in closets with a large deck off of bedroom three. Stainless steel appliances, granite kitchen counters and maple cabinets all contribute to a stylish interior ambiance. And energy efficient design means lower utility bills. This beautifully crafted home is located in the Park Place master plan which features the Park House, a major recreational and community amenity with pool, spa, tennis, library, gym, theater and more. Shopping and schools are both close at hand.

From the street, you're greeted by a stately Spanish colonial-inspired home with ornamental tile, iron and wood accents.. It exudes classic, handcrafted charm. Inside, space abounds. A huge kitchen island that seats five anchors and expansive entertainment hub that includes Great Room, dining and California rooms. Perfect for large gatherings and indoor/outdoor living. A first floor bedroom retreat with walk-in closet and huge garage storage area maximize first floor function. Upstairs, a spacious Master Suite is adjoined by a generous laundry room with storage and a large loft off the landing. There is a luxuriousness of space here that enhances relaxation and enjoyment in the evenings. Stainless steel appliances, granite kitchen counters and maple cabinets all contribute to a stylish interior ambiance. And energy efficient design means lower utility bills. Kensington is located in the Park Place master plan which features the Park House, a major recreational and community amenity with pool, spa, tennis, library, gym, theater and more. Shopping and schools are both close at hand. This is a handsomely crafted, well-appointed family home with large activity centers and an open, airy feeling. Available at a very sensible price.

This gorgeous Spanish-style home in Park Place provides 3,415 square feet of living space with 5 bedrooms and 4 baths.. The entry hall offers easy access to a downstairs bedroom and full bath and leads to a spacious open floor plan featuring an expansive great room, kitchen and dining room. The rich tones of maple wood cabinets in Noche give the kitchen a warm look that’s further accentuated by granite countertops in Santa Cecilia. A gourmet island with seating provides extra spots for guests or family members. The great room includes a 42” fireplace that offers an ideal spot for relaxing or entertaining. The master bedroom features a walk-in closet for extra storage space and a spa-like bath with rectangular soaking tub, separate shower and dual vanities topped with E-stone in smooth Glacier White. Beautiful sliding doors open onto a California room that provides an excellent spot for outdoor living throughout the year. ARTO tile, ornamental iron features and decorative lighting give the home’s exterior an impressive appearance. The over-sized garage maximizes storage needs. Community amenities for all residents to enjoy include a resort-style pool and spa, a 24-hour gym, business center and game room. A hobby/craft room, reading room and cyber cafe offer additional opportunities for fun and relaxation.

This exceptional neighborhood features timeless design, elegantly crafted details, stylish appointments and airy, versatile floorplans, perfect for indoor and outdoor entertaining.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
At Serrano Ridge, you can gaze above and watch birds migrate overhead.. Watch trees sway with the wind and fill your lungs with fresh air.
Serrano Ridge is a place to celebrate the natural elements that make us feel alive. It offers single-family detached, two-story homes that reflect the majestic beauty of their surrounding environment. Located in Sycamore Creek in Corona, the area offers over 125 acres of parks, paseos and open space to explore, relax and play like a kid again. You'll enjoy the true essence of indoor-outdoor living from your patio or spacious backyard.
Scenic trails, a 70+ acre nature preserve and an awe-inspiring mountain range provide a beautiful backdrop for any activity. You’ll also enjoy taking advantage of the many features that create a community. The Sycamore Creek Swim Club & Recreation Center and Todd Elementary (K-6) are within the community, while freeway access and nearby stores are only minutes away.
It’s a beautiful community bound together by a shared love of nature. And it’s the perfect place to explore and play to your heart’s content.

Miles of walking and biking trails meander through the community among acres of open space and several large parks.

Double door entry to marble inlay mosaic medallion in foyer, coffered 20 ft. ceilings in foyer and dining room, expansive wall of glass bi-folding door system in family room, 4 fireplaces, a massive resort-style pool with sunken kitchen, and much more! Subdivision.SubdivisionName: Toll Brothers at Robertson Ranch - The Vistas
Subdivision.Agent: Gabe Melendres, Jacqueline Lara, & Elise Watkins
Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From I-5: Exit Cannon Road and proceed East for 3 miles, turn left on Wind Trail Way and left on Glen Avenue.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Surrounded by permanently protected open space, Robertson Ranch is located in a coveted Carlsbad location and is less than 3 miles from the broad, pristine beaches that make Carlsbad such a haven for surfers, parasailers, and body surfing enthusiasts of all ages.. In additional to the fabulous beaches, Carlsbad is home to LEGOLAND California, the famous Flower Fields and the scenic Agua Hedionda and Batiquitos Lagoons. Upscale shopping is conveniently located at The Forum and the famous Carlsbad Premium Outlets. In addition, scenic and picturesque golf courses, including The Crossing are just minutes away. Carlsbad also offers a superb school district, an abundance of parks and open space, and easy access to major freeways and employment, recreational, and entertainment centers.

Listing.Description: A unique covered entry adds curb appeal and welcomes you into a warm and inviting foyer.. Unifying the main living areas is a well-designed open floor plan that boasts a 12' ceiling, which helps to create a bright and airy feel that is sure to impress visiting guests. This well-equipped kitchen offers abundant counter space, a walk-in pantry, a center island with a breakfast bar, and easy access to the formal dining room, which is enhanced by an elegant coffered ceiling. Ideal for entertaining, this radiant great room is quite spacious and provides access to the generous luxury outdoor living space through an expansive sliding door system. Complementing the regal master bedroom is an elevated coffered ceiling, a beautiful window display, a luxurious master bath, and a sizable walk-in closet. Additional highlights include a convenient powder room, an accommodating laundry room, and well-proportioned secondary bedrooms that each include a private bath.

A delightful covered entry adds curb appeal and welcomes you into a charming foyer.. An elevated ceiling height unifies the main living areas throughout this radiant open floor plan, which helps to create a visually-stunning space that is sure to leave a lasting impression. This gorgeous kitchen is well-equipped and features abundant counter space, a large center island with a wrap-around breakfast bar, a walk-in pantry, and an adjacent nook that is graced by a tasteful coffered ceiling. Easily entertain family and friends from the spacious great room or the alluring luxury outdoor living space. Enhancing the remarkable master bedroom is an elegant coffered ceiling, a picturesque bank of windows, a large walk-in closet, and a spa-like master bath. Additional highlights include an appealing formal dining room, a versatile first-floor bedroom, generous secondary bedrooms that each include a full bath, and a second-floor loft that is great for multi-generation entertaining.

Through a welcoming covered entry is a grand two-story foyer that showcases a magnificent curved staircase.. The remarkable great room offers access to the luxury outdoor living space through a 15' sliding glass door system, creating a fabulous space for hosting guests. Easily prepare meals from the stylish kitchen, which features an appealing walk-in pantry and an oversized center island that can seat multiple guests at the breakfast bar. Towards the rear of the home is a secluded bedroom, with a private bath, that is highlighted by a gorgeous view to the luxury outdoor living space and rear yard. This gorgeous master bedroom features an elegant coffered ceiling and has a luxurious master bath that offers a private water closet, dual vanities, a 6' soaking tub with a view, and two walk-in closets. Also included are two additional bedrooms on the second floor that each include a full bath, a desirable loft with an overlook below, and a versatile office.

A captivating covered porch leads into a towering two-story foyer that also neighbors an enticing turned staircase.. A marvelous open floor plan unifies the dining room, great room, and distinguished kitchen, which includes both a walk-in pantry and a butler pantry. Through an elaborate sliding door system from the kitchen is a remarkable luxury outdoor living space, with access to a detached casita, which is convenient for overnight guests. Three additional secondary bedrooms are located on the second floor, each including a private bath and sharing a desirable loft. This exquisite master bedroom is enhanced by a coffered ceiling and a stunning master bath that showcases two walk-in closets, dual vanities, and a 6' tub.

This magnificent covered porch is a great way to welcome guests into a pleasing entry and a charming foyer.. The elegant foyer leads into an expansive kitchen that features a curved island, a walk-in pantry, and views of the side yard. The expansive great room includes views into the dining room and features access to the rear yard, which makes this a great place for entertaining. The formal dining room is accented by a coffered ceiling and is lined by several picturesque window arrangements that allows plenty of natural light to fill the room. The stunning master bedroom flaunts a 9' 6" coffered ceiling and includes a superb master bath, which offers dual vanities, a shower with a seat, a private water closet, and an enormous walk-in closet. Additional highlights include a second-floor loft, large secondary bedrooms that each come with a private bath, and a suitable laundry room.

Arterro at La Costa is nestled in the rolling hills of North County San Diego. Featuring 63 luxury single-family homes. Floor plans range from 3,380 to 4,509 square feet. Pricing from the high 900,000's. Conveniently located adjacent to La Costa Town Center Square, on which construction is currently underway, and will feature a pedestrian friendly shopping experience. This vibrant community has an abundance of attractions and is serviced by award-winning Encinitas Union School and San Dieguito Union High School Districts. davidsoncommunities.com

You'll love this two story floorplan with it's open airy feel and tons of space.. With a large den off the entrance, and four bedrooms, you will have plenty of space for the whole family. Subdivision.SubDescription: FINAL PHASE AND BUILDER CLOSE OUT.. Palazzo at Shadow Hills in North Indio offers the ideal combination of desert elegance and affordability for family living within the privacy of a gated community. When you explore for new homes in North Indio it s clear the choice is Palazzo at Shadow Hills by Woodside Homes. Choose from three beautiful single story floor plans situated on extra wide home sites. Palazzo floor plans have three to five bedrooms ranging from 2181 up to 3029 square feet with a minimum of two and one half baths. Palazzo offers flexible living space with options that include formal living and dining spaces, additional baths, Secondary suite opportunities and outdoor California Rooms. With year round recreation for all ages, Palazzo at Shadow Hills has a diversity of things to see and do. Explore nearby Joshua Tree National Park with camping, hiking, climbing, mountain biking and four wheeling activities available. For those who are more of the thrill seeker, everything from dirt bike riding and hot air ballooning to taking a ride on the Palm Springs Aerial Tram are available. If golf is your thing, well then you ve come to the right neighborhood. Palazzo at Shadow Hills is surrounded by numerous golf facilities both public and private. Don t miss the deserts best value, Palazzo at Shadow Hills.

Woodside Homes at Desert Trace floor plans include three to four bedrooms, offer 2,000 to 2,469 square feet of interior living space and range from two to two and one half baths. Desert Trace offers abundant open designs and exciting amenities packages featuring covered outdoor living spaces that allow you to enjoy the fabulous weather year-round, conversational kitchen and dining ares and welcoming great rooms are perfect for spending time with family and friends. The sunny climate of Indio provides many recreational activities year-round for all ages. For the explores, Joshua Tree National Park is perfect for camping, hiking,rock climbing, and mountain biking. For the adventure seekers, everything from dirt biking, hot air ballooning to riding the Palm Springs Aerial Tram is available. Desert Trace is surrounded by an abundance of golf courses both public and private, that any golf enthusiast would enjoy! Don't miss this incredible value, Woodside Homes at Desert Trace.

Listing.Description: This inviting SINGLE STORY home is available for move in NOW.. At 2,310 sqft, 3 Bedrooms with an Office and 2 Bathroom, this home is packed with a host of upgrades that you NEED to come out and see. See sales professional for details and incentives that ARE available.

Ready for move in NOW.. Beautiful two story, 2775 Sqft home featuring 5 bedrooms, 3 baths, Great Room with Built in Fireplace, Flex Space, Kitchen with Island, Nook, California Room, 3 Car tandem garage and UPSTAIRS laundry room!!!

Our beautiful 2310 sq.. ft. single story home offers 4 to 3 bedrooms with an office, 2 full bathrooms, Gourmet Kitchen with a large chef Island that opens to a spacious Great room. Subdivision.SubDescription: The gated entrance is your portal to your private Palm Springs enclave at the base of the magnificent San Jacinto Mountains and just minutes from Palm Springs International Airport.. Escena is resort style living at its finest. The 130 captivatingly chic, upscale homes are surrounded by the Jack Nicklaus-designed golf course voted the 6th best public golf course in California. The Escena Lounge & Grill was voted the 2010 Best New Restaurant in Palm Springs and offers breakfast, lunch and dinner with stunning views. Four exceptional architectural modern home designs between 2,000 and 2,800 square feet feature open floor plans, stunning archi- tecture and pulse-quickening panoramas. Every incomparable Escena home contains the most current Alta Verde technology and sustainable design features.

Subdivision.SubDescription: A Palladian Villa.. A Tuscan farm house. A Spanish village home. The Mediterranean retreat you’ve always dreamed of is right here in the California desert, in a gated, guarded community nestled in the arms of the scenic San Jacinto Mountains. Located in the exclusive South Canyons area of Palm Springs, Monte Sereno offers the best of all worlds. A serene setting with the famed Indian Canyons hiking trails literally right outside your door – yet minutes from the shops, restaurants, art scene and nightlife of Palm Springs. Here, Old World charm meets contemporary chic in a new generation of Mission Modern architecture. The interior spaciousness that is an Alta Verde hallmark extends outdoors, with one-third-acre estate and golf course lots ideal for homeowners who love to entertain. The two irresistible championship courses at Indian Canyons Golf Resort are a chip shot away.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Pacific Communities is developing another fantastic master-planned community of new homes in Menifee!. Pacific Mayfield will offer three new home neighborhoods and is conveniently located close to two parks, a brand new school, a beautiful trail system, shopping and freeways. Pacific Mayfield is close to the newly opened Menifee Countryside Market Place Mall along Newport Road and Freeway 215. Cottonwood is the first of the three new home neighborhoods within Pacific Mayfield. With six floor plans from which to choose, this innovative new collection of spacious homes is destined to inspire exciting lifestyle possibilities for families. The homes feature highly versatile living space in 2,008 to 4,812 square feet, with as many as 7 bedrooms, 2 to 4 baths, and 2- to 3-car garages. For extra value, we will be including price-included Premium Standard Features, such as slab-granite countertops, Beechwood cabinets and drywall-finished garages -- in every home!
Call and ask our Sales Agents about it at (951) 246-8695.

The open floor plans with signature courtyards and loggias provide an ideal indoor/outdoor living experience. The Master Suites are pampering and spa-inspired. This popular Inland Empire neighborhood of one- and two-story homes offers a collection of five floor plans with up to seven bedrooms, four baths and approximately 3,099 square feet featuring great room living and upscale touches like slab granite kitchen counters and stainless steel appliances.
The thriving master-planned community of Sundance has walkable, tree-lined parkways, two elementary schools and two expansive neighborhood parks. Located in Beaumont, a city with a rich past and an exciting future, you will find nearby golf courses and mountain vistas, along with plenty of convenient shopping, services and easy access to Palm Springs, the San Bernardino Mountains and major business centers in San Bernardino and northwestern Riverside County.

Welcome to Meadow Ridge at Canyon Hills.. This exciting neighborhood features a collection of six big new floor plans with extra-large kitchen islands, game rooms and Pardee’s exclusive GenSmart Suite™ with a private entrance and living areas. Meadow Ridge homes range in size from approximately 2,385 to approximately 4,241 square feet with up to seven bedrooms, three to four and one-half baths, and and three to four- bay garages. Both one- and two-story floor plans are available.
Each of the two-story designs offers a downstairs bedroom with available 12-foot glider window package at the covered patio on select plans. Meadow Ridge also features Pardee’s exclusive LivingSmart® brand with standard and optional measures that boost energy efficiency, save water, improve indoor air quality and encourage material conservation and the use of recycled or sustainable resources.

We invite you to experience Alta Del Mar, a unique enclave of sophisticated homes and custom homesites, many with sweeping views.. Set on a ridgeline above Carmel Valley, Alta Del Mar is coastal San Diego’s last, best opportunity to live above, and apart from, all else.
Perceptive design redefines the possibilities of home, and intuitive floor plans elevate lifestyle opportunities. Complimented by the beautifully preserved open space and trails of Los Penasquitos Canyon Preserve, these residences have it all—with the kind of proportions, appointments and craftsmanship that equal the finest custom homes, anywhere.
If you prefer to start with the blank canvas, Alta Del Mar also features homesites averaging nearly half an acre.
To ensure that you'll receive updates and have the best possible choice of residences and homesites as they become available for release, register on the Interest List.
To learn more about this exceptional new community, visit www.altadelmar.com.

Designed to serve the needs of changing and multi-generational households by offering a guest house within the home with private entry, living, sleeping and eating spaces, Meadow Glen offers great value and versatility. Country French, Italian, Mediterranean and Spanish inspired architecture accent eight floor-plans including both one- and two-story models, and a range of four to five bedrooms and up to approximately 3,134 square feet.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Summerfield at Canyon Hills is perfect for first-time buyers, young families and anyone looking for a charming new one or two-story home.. Summerfield offers great value and three versatile floorplans designed to fit your family’s unique needs. Enjoy great room living, large kitchens, optional covered patios and generous backyards for spacious living.
Summerfield features Spanish, Italian and Traditional style exteriors, and interiors packed with exciting amenities including convenient kitchen islands, slab granite kitchen countertops, large walk-in closets in the master bedrooms and versatile great room living. Like every new Pardee home, Summerfield with include Pardee’s eco-friendly LivingSmart® program with energy-saving and earth-friendly measures to improve your indoor quality of life.
Located west of Canyon Lake in the foothills of Lake Elsinore, Canyon Hills offers convenient shopping, neighborhood and community parks, schools, an intranet to keep neighbors connected and two ‘residents only’ recreation centers with swimming pools. A proposed third recreation center with pool and children’s play area is anticipated to start construction in late 2015 near Summerfield.
Summerfield at a Glance
Three to four bedrooms
Two to three baths
Approximately 1,538 to 1,948 square feet
Two-bay garages
One- and two-story floorplans
LivingSmart® energy-saving features and options

Casabella is the newest neighborhood at Pacific Highlands Ranch, located just east of Carmel Valley in North County San Diego, where high achieving schools in the Del Mar Union and San Dieguito Union High School districts, nearby shopping, acres of preserved natural habitat and San Diego’s premiere business and educational facilities are just minutes away. Combine a fabulous location with elegant, eco-friendly living in a choice of four floorplans (three plans are modeled) and a distinctive way of life awaits you. These luxury new homes boast great room living, lofts, covered patios, amazing optional prep or chef kitchens and optional spa showers.. An optional Guest Suite (available in Plan 4) provides private quarters within the home and comes with its own bedroom and bathroom, making it ideal for visitors or extended family.
Spanish, Coastal, Traditional. and Napa architectural designs grace these coastal-close two-story homes designed for versatility, style and energy-efficiency with Living Smart® features that make the home environment more comfortable and economical.

Canterra by Pardee Homes is now selling, offering elegant homes that live big inside with welcoming entries, charming courtyards and rear entry garages. Three easy-to-maintain floorplans embrace the indoor-outdoor way of life and feature spacious great rooms, generous dining rooms, space-enhancing lofts and well-defined first-floor bedrooms, ideal for guests. Luxurious options such as a spa shower for the master bathroom, master bedroom retreat, or the unique Guest Suite (Plan 3) add to unique livability of these stylish new homes.. Like all homes built by Pardee, Canterra includes the LivingSmart® package of standard and optional features that increase energy-efficiency, and help you save water and money each and every month.
Spanish, Coastal, Traditional and Napa architectural designs grace these two-story homes located in Pacific Highlands Ranch, just east of Carmel Valley and considered one of San Diego’s best coastal locations. Surrounded by acres of preserved natural habitat, residents of Pacific Highlands Ranch have access to convenient shopping, award-winning schools in the Del Mar Union and San Dieguito Union High School districts, and an expansive nature reserve with hiking and biking trails.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: Exit I-10 at Highland Springs Avenue in Beaumont. Go North on Highland Springs Avenue to Cougar Way and turn left.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Come discover Northstar at Sundance, the center of innovative style, flexible solutions, energy saving design and indoor/outdoor living.. Featuring detached living in three innovative floor plans, Northstar includes both one- and two-story homes with up to five bedrooms, three baths and two- and three-bay garages. Great rooms accent the fresh new feel of these exciting floorplans with covered patios, dens and bedroom options available. The Plan 3 home is available with the GenSmart Suite™ featuring a separate entrance and spaces for living, sleeping and eating; an option that creates exciting new opportunities to ‘house’ family and friends for short visits and extended living arrangements.
Northstar is located in The Highlands, a new village in the thriving master-planned community of Sundance. Located in Beaumont, a city with a rich past and an exciting future, you will find nearby golf courses and mountain vistas, along with plenty of convenient shopping, services and easy access to Palm Springs, the San Bernardino Mountains and major business centers in San Bernardino and northwestern Riverside County. Plans for The Highlands include a future recreation center and a neighborhood park.

• Three to five bedrooms

• Approximately 1,813 to 2,438 square feet
• Two and three-bay garages
• GenSmart Suite™ Option-Plan 3
• LivingSmart® energy-saving features and options

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Fresh and vibrant Skycrest at Sundance, featuring three versatile floor plans and both one- and two-story designs, anticipate everyday practicality while allowing for personalized spaces.. You’ll find great room living, lofts, covered patios, formal dining rooms and options for dens, game rooms, office/hobby rooms, a fifth bedroom or Pardee’s exclusive GenSmart Suite™ with separate entrance and spaces for living, sleeping and eating (per plan). Designed for growing families, Skycrest also boasts big kitchen islands with seating, convenient kitchen pantries, built-in stainless steel GE® appliances, roomy laundry rooms with plenty of storage space and remarkable master bedroom suites, with large walk-in closets.
Located in The Highlands, a new village in master-planned Sundance, Skycrest homeowners enjoy tree-lined parkways, nearby elementary schools and two expansive neighborhood parks. Plans for The Highlands include a future recreation center and a neighborhood park. Located in Beaumont, a city with a rich past and an exciting future, Sundance offers stunning mountain vistas, along with plenty of convenient shopping, services and easy access to Palm Springs, the San Bernardino Mountains and major business centers in San Bernardino and northwestern Riverside County.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Now Selling. It’s time to discover a place where you can spread out and breathe easy.. It’s time to discover Olive Hill, an exquisite collection of 37 single-story homes on ½ acre (average) homesites located in the charming community of Bonsall. Four spacious floorplans offer great room living, welcoming front porch entries, state-of-the-art gourmet kitchens with large preparation islands, both casual and formal dining areas, outdoor rooms and an amazing game room (Plans 2, 3, 4). Options for a den or office, craft room, library, or spa shower are available (per plan) and a limited number of Plan 1 homes feature a second floor loft or optional fifth bedroom. Plan 4 includes Pardee Homes’ exclusive GenSmart Suite with its own entrance and spaces for living, sleeping and eating. Spanish Colonial, Country Ranch and Tuscan architectural details reflect the serene nature of the rural Bonsall lifestyle.

Subdivision.SubdivisionNumber: Vista Serena at Indian Palms Country Club
Subdivision.SubdivisionName: Vista Serena at Indian Palms Country Club
Subdivision.DrivingDirections:
The main entrance to Indian Palms Country Club is located on Monroe Street, just South of 48th Avenue. From Interstate 10, take the Monroe exit, south, and drive on Monroe approx. 5 miles to the Indian Palms main entrance.
Follow the signs to Vista Serena model center.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Welcome to Vista Serena at Indian Palms Country Club, a collection of new homes in Indio, CA.. Surrounded by dramatic mountain ranges and rich natural desert terrain, Vista Serena offers a fun loving resort lifestyle with elegance, ambiance, and amenities galore. Located in the heart of Indio the new home community offers dazzling views and prime location. Offering the perfect resort lifestyle for the discerning active homeowner, Vista Serena not only boasts all the amenities of Indian Palms but also everything nearby La Quinta has to offer of restaurants, shopping and entertainment.
At Indian Palms Country Club you will experience country club living at its very best. From a 27-hole Championship golf course, five lighted tennis courts, heated pools & spas, to a state-of-the-art health and fitness center. Relax in the beautiful clubhouse with pro shop, and enjoy eclectic dining in the La Palma Restaurant and Bar. An on-site boutique hotel is the perfect place for friends to stay and play. A private and pristine setting under desert skies, we invite you to join us in living "the good life" at Vista Serena at Indian Palms Country Club.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Tree lined streets along gently rolling hills, parks, a nature preserve, trails and a swim club, across from a vibrant commercial center; Sycamore Creek is a master planned community that is in harmony with nature.. What better place for Van Daele Homes to introduce three sensational new floor plans designed by award-winning architects, ranging from approximately 3,400 to over 4,000 sq. ft. Imagination Rooms, Bonus Rooms, Great Rooms, Gathering Rooms, California Rooms, Guest Suites and much more! Prices starting from the low $500,000’s.
The Arbors at Sycamore Creek features three stunning new models showcasing beautiful architecture in French Country, Craftsman, Traditional and Monterey themes. Three unique floorplans provide 3,482 to 4,688 square feet of interior living space, with 4-6 bedrooms, up to 5 ½ baths and 3-car garages. Versatile floorplans offer options for a Guest Suite with Kitchenette, Super Great Room, Gathering Room, Craft Room, Home Office or Flex Room. Each plan also offers the Van Daele signature ‘California Room’, adding nearly 300 square feet of outdoor living space. Van Daele’s California Rooms, also offered with a fireplace enhancement, are setting the industry standard for outstanding design and beauty that creates a seamless transition from interior to exterior living – perfect for entertaining, family fun or a quiet retreat.
Impressive interiors are appointed with custom quality details such as 9’ ceilings throughout, granite kitchen countertops, Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, solid surface bathroom countertops, maple cabinetry, recessed lighting, wood window sills and much more.
Van Daele Homes - we promise you’ll feel good about your new home™.

Enjoy convenient amenities, popular schools and scenic landscapes, just six miles from the Pacific Ocean. Across the nation and in CA we're one of America's leading homebuilders.

Listing.Description: The ranch-style Janine plan greets guests with a covered entry that leads to an attractive courtyard.. The spacious kitchen offers an immense island, walk-in pantry and nook, and the adjacent great room is perfect for entertaining friends and family. Other highlights of this plan include a covered patio, a home office that can be optioned as an extra bedroom and a lavish master suite.

The Jocelyn plan offers the ultimate in comfort and elegance with a formal dining room, an inviting great room and a well-appointed kitchen with a spacious island.. The den can be optioned as an additional bedroom with full bath, and the covered patio can be converted to a club room. Upstairs, you'll find a large loft, a library and a luxurious master suite with a private deck.

The spacious Josie floor plan is ideal for entertaining, with a formal dining room, an inviting great room, a well-appointed kitchen with an immense center island and a club room that can be optioned as an extra bedroom.. Upstairs, you'll find a versatile bonus room and three inviting bedrooms, including a lavish master suite with a private bath and roomy balcony.

Welcome home to the ranch-style Joanna plan.. From its covered front porch to the massive great room to a luxurious kitchen with walk-in pantry, central island and breakfast nook, this beautiful new home was designed with your livability in mind. It also offers a formal dining room, a spacious den that can be optioned as an extra bedroom and a relaxing master suite with two walk-in closets.

This new home greets guests with a grand two-story entry.. The main floor offers a quiet study, a formal dining room and an inviting great room with multi-slide doors leading onto the covered patio with fireplace. You'll also appreciate the gourmet kitchen with granite countertops, breakfast nook and separate prep kitchen. Upstairs includes a loft, a library and a master suite with private deck. Includes 16 solar panels.

Phoenix Crest, our newest Southern California community, lights up the foothills of Rancho Cucamonga's San Gabriel Mountains with four beautiful, highly customizable plans from which to choose (and even help create your personalized dream home!).. With its backdrop of the protected North Etiwanda Preserve, Phoenix Crest offers residents access to expansive open space, and completes this perfection with nothing but views to the South.
Topping off the location's beauty, Benchmark is proud to offer a community whose three servicing schools are among the State's top three in their respective age ranges. Phoenix Crest quite literally offers residents what no other Rancho Cucamonga new-home community can.
95 San Gabriel valley view and privacy/mountain view homesites naturally insulated from the city's bustle Multi-generation plan options with private suites and separate entrances, even a dedicated garage (per plan) Easy freeway access to 1-210 and I-15, but without the freeway noise Gated community within the highly desirable Etiwanda School District and Chaffey Joint Union High School District City services such as fire and police; sewer and water systems Peace of mind that comes from choosing Benchmark Communities – the most awarded homebuilder for Customer Satisfaction Pre-Grand Opening pricing from the upper $700s Homes available for October move-ins...be settled before the holiday season
Our onsite sales office is open Saturday - Wednesday 10 am-6 pm, Thursday - Friday 1pm-6pm, so be sure to come out and visit us soon. Several Phase 2 homes are available for October move in and there's still time for you to select your must-have flooring from our Design Center. See you soon!

Subdivision.SubDescription:
SkyRidge offers family-oriented homebuyers an exceptional move-up opportunity in the desirable Woodcrest area of Riverside.. One- and two-story detached homes range from approximately 2,575 to 3,803 square feet, with up to six bedrooms, large great rooms, bonus rooms or dens, and three-car garages. Each SkyRidge floorplan includes a beautiful outdoor room and select designs offer a guest suite with full bathroom. Homesites with minimum lot sizes of 10,000 square feet are generously sized for families who enjoy outdoor dining and entertaining. Many homesite locations also afford distant views of the San Gabriel Mountains.
The Woodcrest location of SkyRidge offers homebuyers inclusion within one of the area’s top-rated public school districts and close proximity to prestigious private schools like Woodcrest Christian High School. The neighborhood is also conveniently situated near popular shopping destinations, recreational amenities and worship centers.

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Cedar Glen presents a rare and exciting opportunity for new home ownership in Yucaipa and is ideally located in the prestigious community of Chapman Heights adjacent to the Yucaipa Valley Golf Club.. Single-family homes offer comfortably spacious interiors, private rear yards for outdoor entertainment and great locations with distant views of the San Bernardino National Forest. Cedar Glen offers buyers the advantages of all new construction, long-term warranties and the commitment of a well-respected homebuilder.
Cedar Glen homeowners enjoy a desirable setting across the street from the Yucaipa Valley Golf Course and Club House, and walking distance from Yucaipa Valley Center. Neighborhood amenities include a private pocket park, central community tot lot and greenbelt. Students can attend well-rated local schools, including Yucaipa High and Chapman Heights Elementary, which is walking distance from Cedar Glen.

William Lyon Homes presents Citrus Court and Citrus Pointe at The Orchards, two brand new collections of attached homes.. Residents at The Orchards will enjoy private amenities including a community pool, spa, barbecues and recreation center. Pocket parks and greenbelts will also be featured throughout the community. The Orchards is walking distance to the Metrolink Station and within close proximity to the 10, 60 and 210 corridors and Ontario International Airport. Leisure and entertainment opportunities include nearby Red Hill Country Club and Golf Course, Ontario Mills and Victoria Gardens.
Two new neighborhoods, private recreation and a downtown Upland location make The Orchards one outstanding opportunity.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: Next to Eastvale Gateway Shopping Center
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Nexus offers brand new townhomes, a convenient Eastvale location off the I-15 at Limonite and gated privacy.. Three-story designs feature Spanish-inspired architecture, modern interiors and comfortable living spaces with dens.
Nexus homeowners enjoy private community recreation, including a swimming pool and spa, tot lot, walking paseos and barbecue area. The neighborhood is within close proximity to shopping, dining and entertainment, as well as the city’s many beautiful parks. It is also walking distance to Eastvale Gateway’s retail amenities and restaurants.

Subdivision.SubDescription: We are delighted to welcome you to The Groves, a community of privilege for a select few.. Here you’ll find the best Temecula homes for sale with sweeping views of the majestic San Jacinto Mountains. This magnificent enclave of 37 homes sites comes with large acreage and sits in the splendor of the Temecula Wine Country, home to some of the area’s best wineries. This ideal location offers country charm, majestic beauty and metropolitan conveniences. Surrounded by vineyards and their tasting rooms, you can be one of the first to sample the rewards of the latest grape harvest, or dazzle your taste buds with culinary delights at local gourmet restaurants. You can even take a stunning ride on a hot air balloon or just enjoy watching the kaleidoscope of color gently float across the sky.

Listing.Description: This home has a large interior courtyard hidden from public eyes which can be accessed from several rooms.. The grand kitchen comes with a wine vault, huge pantry and an amazing island with dual sinks. The family room with fireplace is filled with windows to enjoy views in the backyard. The outdoor living area with fireplace is very chic and is entered through impressive La Cantina bi-fold doors, The casita or bedroom four can be accessed from sliding glass doors from the courtyard or from the home interior.

This home has an outdoor living area with fireplace accessed from a very spacious great room via gorgeous La Cantina bi-fold doors that help to bring the outdoors in.. There is a wine cave, walk-in pantry, butler’s pantry and a large kitchen island with sink and space for a second dishwasher. The four-space garage with work shop area will keep any handyman happy.

The enormous kitchen in this home is big enough to serve up a banquet meal.. It is filled with great features including a large kitchen island, three sinks and a generous KitchenAid appliance package. There is even an option to add a second dishwasher and a second refrigerator if needed. To make this home suite your lifestyle, an array of floor plan options are offered.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Sorrento Homes proudly introduces its first phase of homes nestled in the high desert community of Hesperia.. Hesperia is a growing community with two new shopping centers located to the east and west of Interstate 15, as well as a brand new state-of-the-art hospital being built just off of Mariposa Rd. Conveniently located just off the Main Street exit of Interstate 15 and only 3 miles from the on-ramp, Sorrento Homes is located at the corner of Maple Avenue and Palm Street. With its close proximity to the freeway, Sorrento Homes is ideally suited for those commuting to the Ontario/ Inland Empire area. Plus, Sorrento Homes is located in the highly acclaimed Hesperia Unified School District. Sorrento Homes is committed to building beautiful, energy efficient homes in Southern California. Dedicated to quality craftsmanship, community alliance, unparalleled customer service, and unique architectural design, Sorrento Homes leverages its homebuilding expertise to exceed the expectations of homeowners and revitalize local communities. Come visit our new homes in Hesperia!

Maravilla: simply translated, it means wonder.. And that’s what you’ll find here…Maravilla is an oasis set against the foothills of the beautiful San Jacinto Mountains in sunny Southern California. This active adults-only community offers a high-end living experience at an entry-level price. The homes themselves range from cozy and easy-to-maintain one-story homes, to two-level homes with plenty of bedrooms. The choices range from 1,600 to 2,000 square feet. Maravilla offers five unique floor plans, each with three exterior styles to choose from. All homes boast spacious kitchens with built-in pantries and top-of-the-line appliances. Every floor plan includes in-suite washer and dryer and plenty of closet and storage space throughout. The large master bedrooms have en suite baths with dual sinks, large tubs, and separate shower. All master suites have spacious walk-in closets and high, sloped ceilings. Every plan include family rooms with fireplaces; several models include second bedrooms or optional den/flex room, with the largest design boasting three bedrooms, two baths and a powder room. You’ll have to see the Valencia style’s spacious master bath to believe it! In the heart of the community, the nearly 7,000 square-foot Grand Clubhouse boasts country-club amenities in a welcoming atmosphere. As the focal point of Maravilla, it serves as a meeting place and the highlight of community life. The well-appointed facilities are a natural social mecca, bringing together the community for a variety of activities and social events. Step outside the rear doors of the grand clubhouse and find even more resort-caliber features, nestled in a professionally-designed, lush green landscape. The large swimming pool is perfect for cooling off on a hot summer day, or if the grandchildren are visiting, they can take full advantage of the wading pool. Enjoy a game of tennis on the full-size tennis court or practice your stroke on the private putting and chipping greens. Round up you

Find your spirit, in the heart of Palm Springs.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Villa Portofino is the only place of its kind in the Coachella Valley.. This premier 55+ active adult community is located on 50 scenic acres in the heart of Palm Desert. A stunning collection of single-story detached and attached homes boasting up to 2,341 square feet, three bedrooms with den and two-and-one-half baths as well as two-car garages and covered loggia are nestled in a gated community in the center of the Coachella Valley, surrounded by panoramic views of the San Jacinto and Santa Rosa Mountains. At Villa Portofino, the focus is on a healthy, happy lifestyle. Enjoy the many amenities and activities at the luxurious clubhouse, and, because Villa Portofino is located in the heart of Palm Desert – world-class restaurants, shopping and nightlife are virtually right outside your door. Villa Portofino offers it all: world-class location, luxurious Clubhouse and maintenance-free lifestyle. With its prestigious Palm Desert address, you get to spend more time enjoying life and less time and money driving to it. The community is a few minutes from dining, shopping, golf, entertainment and Eisenhower Medical Center.

Listing.Description: The moment you enter this cozy villa, you’ll be struck by its intrinsic beauty.. Generous windows dapple the great room with sunlight, while soaring 10-foot ceilings lend an air of spacious elegance. Many a masterpiece can be made in the gourmet kitchen before enjoying the desert breeze on your private loggia. The den is your personal canvas – office, library, whatever you want. The gracious master bedroom suite, your private retreat. You’re living the Villa Portofino life.

The centerpiece of the Vista Montagna is the spacious great room.. The perfect setting for entertaining, flanked by the gourmet kitchen, accented by granite countertops and beautifully crafted cabinetry – and steps away, the large sun-swept loggia with its gorgeous view. The master bedroom suite and second bedroom are located on opposite wings of the Villa, affording privacy for you and guests. Attention has been paid to every last detail of your dream desert abode. That’s the hallmark of a Villa Portofino home.

It’s the definition of fine desert living.. Elegant. Airy. Sophisticated. The great room and stunning gourmet kitchen meld into a magnificent open living/entertaining area. Step out onto your private loggia and savor the gentle night breeze. The sumptuous master bedroom suite has its own doors to the balcony, a large walk-in closet and beautifully appointed bath. The second bedroom and full bath practically beckon family and friends, while the den is purposely set aside for your personal sanctuary.

Brushed by ocean breezes navigating through coastal bluffs, New Crest Court includes 16 homes in an architectural enclave that inspires a new way of coastal living. Residences feature two story floor plans with up to 5 bedrooms ranging from 3,603 to 4,234 square feet. Prices start in the mid $1.2 millions. Honoring the past ... and the very best eras and styles of Southern California living ... New Crest Court homes have been designed and built with extraordinary care toward a future of comfortable casual living, value, and efficiency. New Crest Court invites the most active lifestyle—walking and hiking along a vast lagoon, bicycling to village shops, beach going, raising children, and more. Here you can step in time with family, friends, community and nature in a way that feels whole and right, and life becomes a way of making new music in the dawning and the dusk of each day.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Vista del Sur is a premier new community near the Ocean View Hills area of South San Diego.. The gorgeous two-story tri-plex homes at Maravilla and upscale three-story townhomes at Esperanza showcase rich exteriors influenced by Mission, Tuscan, or Craftsman architecture and are offered in 6 distinct floor plans. With the many wonderful interior and exterior combinations available you are sure to find one that fits the unique lifestyle and taste of you and your family. Residences range from 1,334 to 1,830 square feet and all feature 3 or 4 bedroom configurations and up to 3.5 bathrooms. All homes include central air-conditioning and a two-car side-by-side attached garage. Every home will boast a private yard perfect for outdoor living and entertaining. The ideal location of Vista del Sur offers convenient access to an array of vibrant shopping, recreational, and entertainment opportunities in addition to numerous nearby schools, parks, beaches and growing business and commercial areas. Vista del Sur will offer its residents all of the must-have amenities that today’s active families look for, including a generous pool, large spa, pool-side lounge space, several grills and an outdoor seating. Residents will also enjoy several age-appropriate playgrounds, as well as numerous seating areas for relaxation, and specially designed pet play areas throughout the community. The recreational opportunities and outdoor space of nearby Pacific Gateway Park beckon – with many trials for biking, walking and running and seemingly endless wide-open natural spaces for exercising and outdoor activities of all kinds. Discover the beauty, thoughtful design, and active lifestyle that will await you at Vista del Sur.

Residence 2 features a private fenced entry yard as well as a convenient second-level covered terrace off the living room for outdoor living and entertaining. The large chef's kitchen features a spacious island with bar seating to further maximize the entertaining possibilities in this beautiful home.

Savannah combines the easy livability of AHV's innovative BETTERBUILT homes with a location that offers a wide range of activities. You’ll find your new AHV home in Savannah is built to the highest construction standards. In the words of industry experts, the fit and finish is 'straight' and 'tight'. Also, AHV doesn't try to 'up sell' you on extras. We include high-end finishes like granite countertops, upgraded carpet, and energy-efficient stainless steel appliances as standard features in our homes.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From the 15 freeway exit east on Rancho California Road. Stay on Rancho California Road for approx. 5 miles. Turn left on Butterfield Stage Road. Turn left on La Serena Way. Turn right on Walcott Lane and follow to the models and sales center on the right hand side.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Located in the lush hills above the Temecula Valley, this beautiful hill top gated community will be a true hidden enclave that boasts scenic views of the Temecula wine country.. Just a mere 3 miles from all the major wineries, and close to great schools and shopping this Van Daele new home community will give you all that you are looking for, plus the value, service and quality of a Van Daele home. Pricing from the mid $400,000’s.

Your new home at Madison Estates, in the beautiful Vista Santa Rosa Valley, is surrounded by year round entertainment.. To the south is the renowned Empire Polo and El Dorado Polo Clubs. To the north you can enjoy fun and entertainment at the Fantasy Springs Resort Casino. If you can pull yourself out of your new gourmet kitchen, you can enjoy nearby dining, shopping, golf and equestrian activities in the area. Enjoy entertaining friends and family in this picturesque gated community among the history and culture of the southern California desert. Madison Estates is the best place to call home!

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From Del Dios Highway, Turn onto Bing Crosby Blvd. First community on the Left (just before reaching The Crosby gates)
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Built by award-winning Davidson Communities, Enclave Rancho Santa Fe is a unique collection of luxurious residences located adjacent to The Crosby behind it's own private gates.. Living at Enclave assures your enjoyment of a private home and the enviable pleasure of The Crosby golf course, offering exquisite social and sport programs. Here refined architecture honors the valley's great natural beauty of canyons and fairways while exemplifying Davidson Communities' innovative floor plans, enhanced livability and thoughtful craftsmanship.
Enclave, featuring 13 homes of true and lasting value, was built thoughtfully by a team of experts for you and your family. Now offering floor plans up to approximately 3,881 square feet in size with 4 to 5 bedrooms and up to 5.5 baths. These residences were strategically designed to be flexible, highlighting a downstairs/dual master suite, den/office areas and bonus rooms.
Surpass your own expectations for luxury living in Rancho Santa Fe.
Pricing starting in the mid $1.2M's.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From 91 freeway, exit Central Avenue. Proceed west on Central to Palm Avenue, turn right. Proceed to Jurupa Avenue, turn left. Proceed approx. ¼ mile to Atherton entrance on left side of Jurupa.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Welcome to Atherton Square, a unique collection of 43 two-story homes nestled behind gates of a warm and inviting community within a park like setting.. Conveniently located just west of Riverside's popular business and shopping districts, Atherton Square provides the perfect setting for professionals and young families alike. Atherton Square, the perfect place to call home.

Listing.Description: Atherton Square offers 4 distinct two-story plans with up to 2,300 square feet of living space.. With artistically designed exteriors in rich color pallets, the homes offer up to 4 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, island-style kitchens, walk-in pantry's, upstairs laundry with walk-in linen, and lofts, dens and dual walk-in closets in select plans. ~Residence 1:Two-Story,Approx. 1,928 Square Feet,3 Bedrooms,2 11/2 Baths,Great Room,Dining Room,Loft~Upstairs Laundry with Walk-in Linen,2-Car Garage

Subdivision.SubDescription:
Pacific Willow offers a lofty new perspective on elegant, close-to-everything family living.. Rancho Belago is among California's fastest-growing cities, with a population currently estimated at more than 170,000. The city's strategic Inland Empire location in western Riverside County is adjacent to March Air Reserve Base and many of the area's most popular recreation spots. Supporting Rancho Belago's strong population growth are a wide variety of new housing opportunities, a rapidly expanding economy, and an emphasis on education and city services.
Pacific Willow is close to the spectacular Moreno Valley Ranch Golf Club, a uniquely designed public facility with 27 holes that can be played in three different 18-hole combinations - Valley/Mountain, Mountain/Lake and Lake/Valley. Also close to home for Pacific Willow residents is all the family oriented fun of the 8,000 acre Lake Perris State Recreation Area, including boating, fishing, swimming, picnicking, hiking, bicycling, horseback riding and camping. Additional equestrian and hiking trails are available at Box Springs Mountain Reserve, and Norton Younglove Reserve is a popular off roading destination.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From Hwy 163 : Exit on Friars Road east, left on Mission Center Road, right on Civita Blvd. Turn left on Via Alta. Apex is located at the top of Via Alta. - From I-8 : Exit on Mission Center Road, turn right on Civita Blvd.Turn left on Via Alta. Apex is located at the top of Via Alta. - From I-5 : Exit I-805 east, turn left on Mission center road, right on Civita Blvd.Turn left on Via Alta. Apex is located at the top of Via Alta.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Apex at Civita is a stunning collection of 58 single family detached homes boasting vibrant textures and glass woven into sleek contemporary styles upon the summit of the community.. Homes range from 2092 to 2229 square feet offering a mixture of design options up to 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. Apex’s modern California design, luxurious finishes, expansive windows connect with dual outdoor entertaining areas, optional bonus rooms and multigenerational suites. Homes at Apex are equipped with energy efficient LED fixtures throughout that produce a range of ambiance for every mood and occasion. Located in Mission Valley in the heart of San Diego, Civita combines a lively urban lifestyle with proximity to shopping and restaurants and easy trolley access to downtown San Diego, Old Town and Qualcomm Stadium. For those who prefer an active lifestyle, parks and trails abound and the beach is never far away.

Subdivision.SubDescription: Enjoy the crisp clean air of the High Desert on a Half Acre Home Site.. Go Fishing, Camping or Picnic at nearby Hesperia Lake or Golfing at the Hesperia Golf Course and Country club... Enjoy free Movie Nights at the Civic Plaza Park and the annual Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony plus many other community events. Shopping and Restaurants just minutes away.

Listing.Description: Double Sided Fireplace, Built In Desk at Breakfast Nook, Window Coverings Included, Stainless Steel Appliances, Upgraded Carpeting and Porcelain Tile Floors, Large Corner Lot, Indoor Laundry Room,

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From 15 Freeway : If traveling the 15 Freeway, exit on Limonite Avenue and head west. Proceed on Limonite Avenue for approximately 2.5 miles, and turn right at Archibald Avenue. Travel approximately 0.5 miles on Archibald Avenue, and turn right at Merrill Avenue. Continue on Merrill until you have entered Park Place. Directional signage for Camden will be located throughout the community. - From 60 Freeway : If traveling the 60 freeway, exit on Archibald Avenue and head south. Proceed on Archibald Avenue for approximately 3.25 miles, and turn left at Merrill Avenue. Continue on Merrill until you have entered Park Place. Directional signage for Camden will be located throughout the community.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Camden at Park Place is located in the Park Place neighborhood, which offers first-class amenities such as a state of the art clubhouse complete with conference center, fitness club, Movie Theater and resort-style swimming pool. This collection of quintessential homes features up to 5 bedrooms, and each floorplan is enhanced by an inviting, outdoor covered patio, perfect for relishing the beautiful California weather.. These exciting plans also offer living spaces that every growing family appreciates, including spacious, kitchens, lofts and garages with plenty of storage space.

Listing.Description: Camden Plan 1 C Quick Move-in homes on Home Site 0039 in Camden at Park Place - New homes priced at $511,889 with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms.

This beautiful 2,737 square foot 2 story home has up to 5 bedrooms, up to 3 baths and a 2 car garage with storage.. The open floor plan flows into an outdoor room perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing. The beautiful kitchen has a large island and opens up into the dining room and Great Room. Upstairs homeowners will enjoy a large master bedroom featuring over sized windows to enjoy the outdoor view and a walk-in closet.

Plan 2 is a beautiful 2,900 square foot home featuring up to 5 bedrooms, up to 4 bathrooms and a 3- car tandem garage.. As you enter through the foyer your eyes are drawn immediately towards the ceiling up to the second floor. Next, the great room flows seamlessly into the kitchen, dining room and outdoor room. As you walk up the stairs that are open to the below you will find a large master bedroom with dual walk-in closets, 4 bedrooms, a laundry room and a loft.

Plan 3 has 3,062 square feet of living space with up to 5 bedrooms, up to 4 baths, and a 3-car tandem garage.. The open floor plan features a gourmet kitchen with an oversized island that flows into the dining and great room. Off the dining room, homeowners will be sure to enjoy the California weather in their outdoor room. Upstairs there are 4 bedrooms including the master which features a large walk-in closet. In addition, there is a loft and a laundry room conveniently located next to the bedrooms.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From Riverside County : Take 91 freeway to 15 freeway south. Take Diamond Drive/Railroad Canyon Road exit. Turn right onto Diamond Drive. Turn right ontoSummerly Place. Turn right on to First Green. Models will be on the right.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Tee off at The Links golf course, grab a bite at The Grille restaurant or enjoy a day exploring the 37 acres of community parks.. And, to keep things cool, fun and out in the sun, dive into Summerly Splash, with brand new swimming pool, wading pool, spa, picnic area and fireplace.

Listing.Description: Beautiful 2,589 square foot home featuring 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a 3 car tandem garage which includes a bedroom and full bathroom on ground level.. This home has many designer upgrades throughout and a covered patio. With a very desirable location within the community you will be walking distance to the community pool, spa and playground, and near the local baseball stadium and beautiful Lake Elsinore Lake!
Monarch Grove Plan 1 floor plan of the Monarch Grove at Summerly community.. 3 bedrooms/2 bathrooms starting from $351,400
Monarch Grove Plan 2 floor plan of the Monarch Grove at Summerly community.. 4 bedrooms/3 bathrooms starting from $361,400
Monarch Grove Plan 3 floor plan of the Monarch Grove at Summerly community.. 4 bedrooms/3 bathrooms starting from $371,400

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From Riverside County : Take 91 freeway to 15 freeway south. Take Diamond Drive/Railroad Canyon Road exit. Turn right onto Diamond Drive. Turn left onto Village Parkway. Models will be on the left.
Subdivision.SubDescription: Make your dream of homeownership come true with three sensational new floorplans.. Enjoy the comfort of California living with desirable indoor and outdoor living spaces, ideal for entertaining friends and family. Summerly Splash includes a pool, wading pool, spa, picnic areas and a fireplace. The surrounding area of Lake Elsinore is equally enticing, with a wide variety of amenities and activities. A number of private parks, including Spirit Park, with a playground, great lawn, shade structures, and barbecue and picnic areas are all just steps away. The community is also convenient to skydiving, moto-cross racing and baseball games at the Diamond Stadium. Enjoy being on the water or spend the day at nearby shops and restaurants. With inspiring views of the Santa Ana Mountain Range, Sunrise Springs at Summerly will be an ideal place to call home.

Listing.Description: Sunrise Springs Plan 2 A Quick Move-in homes on Home Site 0001 in Sunrise Springs at Summerly - New homes priced at $321,507 with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

This 1,520 square foot single story home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths and a 2-car garage.. The open floor plan offers homeowner the perfect place to spend time with family or entertain friends. Off the 2-car garage there is a drop zone or an optional tech center ideal for a computer or a space for kids to do their homework.

This single story 1,735 square foot home features an open floor plan with up to 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a 2-car garage.. Off the great room homeowners have the option of enjoying the beautiful California weather on covered patio. The Master has a nice bathroom with a walk-in closet.

This 1,870 square foot two story home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, a bonus room and a 2-car garage.. The open floor plan offers homeowner the perfect place to spend time with family or entertain friends. Off the 2-car garage there is a drop zone or an optional tech center ideal for a computer or a space for kids to do their homework. The second floor is a large bonus room or optional 4th bedroom and 3rd bath.

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From the 15 Freeway. Exit Temecula Parkway East. Left on Hwy. 371. Left on Bautista 2 Miles. Right at Upper Valley Rd (aka Scrub Oak) to Entrance. 36750 Upper Valley RD.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Something incredible is happening in Southern California!
An opportunity many considered no longer possible: The opportunity to create your dream.. Thomas Mountain Ranch is truly a place you need to see to believe. Situated on 265 pristine, meticulously preserved acres at the base of Thomas Mountain, and surrounded by the Cleveland and San Bernardino National Forests, the property gives you access to the most spectacular, wide open spaces of Anza Valley, California. Here, at an elevation of 4,000 feet, but just 30 minutes from the world-class dining, resorts, and shops of Palm Desert, you have a unique chance to design your own experience. Yours will be one of just 46 custom-built homes on the property, each sitting on a 2-4 acre homesite, with access to 150 acres of open space, including miles of walking and equestrian trails. Surrounded by Pinon Pines, Manzanita, Red Shank, and year-round wildflowers, you'll discover a new way to live, within a panorama of natural beauty, clean air, amazing sunsets, starry nights, and equally sensational sunrises. Nature has given us the canvas. We invite you to bring us your dream.

Listing.Description: Gorgeous Hacienda inspired architecture.. Inviting covered veranda and courtyard. Dramatic entry tower with beamed ceilings. Solid core Knotty Alder doors throughout. Andersen series windows. Kitchen with large island, pantry, buffet, finished beautifully with granite counters and Samsung stainless appliance package. Family room with French doors that frame the mountain views. Wood burning fireplace. Spacious master suite with generous walk in closet. Bath features free standing soaking tub and tile surrounds. Want more, check out the 954 square foot completely finished basement.

Stately, single level, Hacienda inspired architecture.. Dramatic entry tower. Great room with 10' beamed ceilings, French and solid core Knotty Alder doors throughout. Wood burning fireplace. Kitchen features Hickory cabinets, large center island and pantry, stainless appliances. Grand master suite. Gorgeous majestic mountains set the backdrop for the outdoor veranda. 2.2 beautiful acres of usable land dotted with native flora.

Jetliner views in this custom built Hacienda inspired beauty.. 10' ceilings. Solid core Knotty Alder doors throughout. Dramatic entry tower. Multiple covered verandas. Walk out lower level features an additional bath and 954 sqft. for a total of 3,588 sqft. Situated on 2.58 gorgeous acres. Plenty of room for horses.
Main Floor - 2256 Square Feet, 3 Bedrooms, 2 Baths Lower Level - 1,328 Square Feet (with walk out) 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath 2 Car Attached Garage

Subdivision.SubDescription:
The Mid-Century Modern mood thrives in Desert Hot Springs, home of the magnificent mineral springs and the world-renowned spas that have enthralled Hollywood celebrities for decades.. The sense of calm, the lights at night, the sweeping mountain views can all be experienced from your new home at Vista Palms. Rising from the hillside heights, you've found a rare mix of yesterday's clean and contemporary Mid-Century Modern design in a home that embodies the innovations of today. Vista Palms is the height of cool, a study in fine design with angled roofs and uncomplicated linear lines integrating perfectly with the stunning simplicity of desert landscaping.
Designed to captivate and to accommodate in the most modern way, Vista Palms offers spacious floor plans that seamlessly transition from room to room; ranging from 1,918 to 2,108 square feet. Impressive details highlight throughout with features that are decidedly custom quality.
Marvel at the views, and enjoy the beauty of peaceful surroundings in a home that is truly a Mid-Century work of art.

Listing.Description: 1918 Square Feet, 3 Bedrooms, 3 Baths, 2 Car Garage, Private Pool Area
2,054 Square Feet, 3 Bedrooms, 2 Baths, 2 Car Garage, Unique Artisan Kitchen
